action->Bar Brawler.name: Luchador de bar
action->Bar Brawler.description: El camarero ha estado en suficientes peleas de bar como para saber cómo lanzar algunos golpes. Cuando pelea en su bar y realiza un ataque no letal, el camarero obtiene una bonificación de circunstancia +1 a las tiradas de ataque y reparte un [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4 damage} adicional.

action->Barkeep's Advice.name: El consejo del barman
action->Barkeep's Advice.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Efecto El camarero da algunos consejos pertinentes a una sola criatura además de ellos mismos. Durante 24 horas, cuando esa criatura falla una prueba de habilidad o una tirada de salvación, puede recordar este consejo y volver a realizar la prueba, utilizando en su lugar el segundo resultado. Una vez que esa criatura usa esta habilidad, su efecto termina.

Una criatura que recibe el consejo del barman estemporalmente inmune a la habilidad durante 1 mes.

Barrister.name: Abogado
Barrister.publicNotes:
Los abogados pueden actuar como fiscales penales o defensores legales, defendiendo los derechos de aquellos acusados ​​de delitos o nombrados como acusados ​​en casos civiles. En un caso judicial u otro procedimiento legal, el abogado es un desafío de cuarto nivel.

Las sociedades más grandes dependen de aquellos que tienen la autoridad y la capacidad de interpretar y hacer cumplir las leyes. En sociedades bien alineadas, estos funcionarios desempeñan sus funciones de manera justa. En los neutrales y malvados, estoslos funcionarios pueden ser duros y crueles (con una alineación alterada para reflejar esto), imponiendo castigos severos a quienes no pueden pagar por la clemencia.

equipment->Court Garb.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jJZbdMHMdh8UL2j8]
Atuendo de la corte
equipment->Court Garb.description: Fine clothing, suitable for a noble or royal, is made with expensive fabrics, precious metals, and intricate patterns.

equipment->Law Book.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hywANJCzT7hMgWna]
Libro de leyes
equipment->Law Book.description: Scholarly journals are uncommon. Each scholarly journal is a folio on a very specific topic, such as vampires or the history of a single town or neighborhood of a city. If you spend 1 minute referencing an academic journal before attempting a skill check to Recall Knowledge about the subject, you gain a +1 item bonus to the check. A compendium of journals costs five times as much as a single journal and requires both hands to use; each compendium contains several journals and grants its bonus on a broader topic, such as all undead or a whole city. The GM determines what scholarly journals are available in any location.

equipment->Writing Set.name: Writing Set
equipment->Writing Set.description: Using a writing set, you can draft correspondence and scribe scrolls. A set includes stationery, including a variety of paper and parchment, as well as ink, a quill or inkpen, sealing wax, and a simple seal. If you've written a large amount, you can refill your kit with extra ink and paper.

action->Sway the Judge and Jury.name: Influir en el juez y el jurado
action->Sway the Judge and Jury.description:
Un abogado obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +2 a las pruebas de Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} alguno de los miembros que deciden dentro de una sala del tribunal.

Si el abogado tiene éxito @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Performs} contra un @Check[type:performance|dc:20] durante los 20 minutos previos a la prueba, aumenta la bonificación de circunstancia a +4.

1.label: Influya en el juez y el jurado: actuación exitosa

action->Cite Precedent.name: Citar precedente
action->Cite Precedent.description:
El abogado utiliza la jurisprudencia existente para socavar su oposición. Si tienen éxito en una prueba de @Check[type:legal-lore|dc:20]{Legal Lore}, imponen una penalización de circunstancia de -2 en la siguiente prueba de Diplomacia que un oponente intente en una discusión legal.

Cualquier intento posterior de citar precedentes fracasa hasta que se discute un nuevo tema con precedentes diferentes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.KdV8UtN8Af5oCerj]{Effect: Cite Precedent}

Beast Tamer.name: Domador de bestias
Beast Tamer.publicNotes:
Los domadores de bestias traen lo salvaje a la civilización, criando y entrenando criaturas para que sigan sus órdenes y realicen trucos llamativos que entretengan al público.

Las actuaciones pueden servir como entretenimiento, expresiones de belleza o parte de una cultura compartida.

spell->Animal Form.name: Animal Form
spell->Animal Form.description:
You call upon primal energy to transform yourself into a Medium animal battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose ape, bear, bull, canine, cat, deer, frog, shark, or snake. You can decide the specific type of animal (such as lion or snow leopard for cat), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 16 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +9, and your damage bonus is +1. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack bonus is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +9, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of animal you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tk3go5Cl6Qt130Dk]{Ape}
    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee a fist, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.gQnDKDeBTtjwOWAk]{Bear}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing;
    • Melee a claw (agile), Damage 1d8 slashing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BT1ofB6RvRocQOWO]{Bull}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee a horn, Damage 2d8 piercing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sN3mQ7YrPBogEJRn]{Canine}
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ptOqsN5FS0nQh7RW]{Cat}
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d6 piercing;
    • Melee a claw (agile), Damage 1d10 slashing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.F4DTpDXNu5IliyhJ]{Deer}
    • Speed 50 feet;
    • Melee a antler, Damage 2d6 piercing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.j2LhQ7kEQhq3J3zZ]{Frog}
    • Speed 25 feet, swim Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee a tongue (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d4 bludgeoning.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qPaEEhczUWCQo6ux]{Shark}
    • swim Speed 35 feet;
    • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing;
    • breathe underwater but not in air.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.kz3mlFwb9tV9bFwu]{Snake}
    • Speed 20 feet, climb Speed 20 feet, swim Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee a fangs, Damage 2d4 piercing plus 1d6 poison.

Heightened (3rd) You instead gain 10 temporary HP, AC = 17 + your level, attack modifier +14, damage bonus +5, and Athletics +14.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +9, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +7 and double the number of damage dice, and Athletics +20.

spell->Animal Messenger.name: Animal Messenger
spell->Animal Messenger.description:
You offer food, and an ordinary Tiny animal within range approaches to eat it. You imprint the image, direction, and distance of an obvious place or landmark well known to you within the animal. You can also attach a small object or note up to light Bulk to it. The animal does its best to reach the destination; if it makes it there, it waits nearby and allows nonhostile creatures to approach and remove the attached object. The spell ends after the message is delivered or after 24 hours, whichever comes first.

If there are no Tiny wild animals in range, the spell is lost.

spell->Speak with Animals.name: Speak with Animals
spell->Speak with Animals.description: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals. The spell doesn't make them more friendly than normal. Cunning animals are likely to be terse and evasive, while less intelligent ones often make inane comments.

spell->Dancing Lights.name: Luces danzantes
spell->Dancing Lights.description: Creas hasta cuatro luces flotantes, ninguna de las cuales está a más de 10 pies de distancia. Cada uno arroja luz como una antorcha. Cuando sostienes el hechizo, puedes mover cualquier cantidad de luces hasta 60 pies. Cada luz debe permanecer a 120 pies de usted y a 10 pies de todas las demás, o parpadeará.

spell->Grease.name: Grease
spell->Grease.description:
You conjure grease, with effects based on choosing area or target.

  • Area [4 contiguous 5-foot squares] All solid ground in the area is covered with grease. Each creature standing on the greasy surface must succeed at a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check against your spell DC or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Creatures using an action to move onto the greasy surface during the spell's duration must attempt either a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check to Balance. A creature that Steps or Crawls doesn't have to attempt a check or save.
  • Target [1 object of Bulk 1 or less] If you cast the spell on an unattended object, anyone trying to pick up the object must succeed at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save against your spell DC to do so. If you target an attended object, the creature that has the object must attempt an Acrobatics check or Reflex save. On a failure, the holder or wielder takes a -2 circumstance penalty to all checks that involve using the object; on a critical failure, the holder or wielder releases the item. The object lands in an adjacent square of the GM's choice. If you cast this spell on a worn object, the wearer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against attempts to grapple them.

spell->Guidance.name: Guidance
spell->Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

spell->Heal Animal.name: Heal Animal
spell->Heal Animal.description:
You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target. The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect.

  • 1 somatic The spell has a range of touch.
  • 2 somatic, verbal The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Jump.name: Jump
spell->Jump.description:
Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

Heightened (3rd) The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.

spell->Magic Fang.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]
colmillo mágico
spell->Magic Fang.description: Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

spell->Produce Flame.name: Produce Flame
spell->Produce Flame.description:
A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach.

On a success, you deal 2d4 fire damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

spell->Stabilize.name: Stabilize
spell->Stabilize.description: Vitality energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

spell->Tanglefoot.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]
Pie enredado
spell->Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

weapon->Whip.name: Whip
weapon->Whip.description: This long strand of thick leather, often braided, delivers a painful but nonlethal slash at a distance, usually accompanied by a distinctive cracking sound.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment->Holly and Mistletoe.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QbOlqr4lSkeOEfty]
Acebo y muérdago
equipment->Holly and Mistletoe.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QbOlqr4lSkeOEfty]

Las plantas de significado sobrenatural proporcionan un enfoque primordial para los lanzadores de hechizos primarios, como los druidas, cuando usan ciertas habilidades y lanzan algunos hechizos. Para utilizarlo se debe sostener en una mano un manojo de acebo y muérdago. Existen otros focos primarios para los druidas centrados en otros aspectos de la naturaleza.

action->Wild Empathy.name: Empatía salvaje
action->Wild Empathy.description: El domador de bestias puede usar la Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} en animales y para hacer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} muy simples con ellos.

action->Trained Animal.name: Animal entrenado
action->Trained Animal.description:
El domador de bestias lucha junto a un animal aliado entrenado de su nivel o inferior, muy probablemente un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.ypLkUfuHHfNDsVUQ]{Tiger}. El animal tiene el número estándar de acciones, usa su bloque de estadísticas normal y cuenta normalmente para el presupuesto de XP del encuentro.

El domador de bestias puede gastar 1 acción para obtener el beneficio de apoyo apropiado para su animal entrenado. A diferencia de un animal de compañía, esto no requiere que el animal utilice ninguna de sus acciones.

Beggar.name: Mendigo
Beggar.publicNotes:
Donde hay pobreza, hay mendigos. Los mendigos son verdaderamente los oprimidos de la sociedad: personas que han sido arrojadas a las calles debido a una variedad de contratiempos o al peso de las circunstancias. Algunos mendigos trabajan para organizaciones del hampa como vigías, espías o incluso músculos contratados a bajo precio, a veces por elección propia, pero a menudo no.

Desafortunadamente, cada sociedad tiene personas que viven al margen. Mientras las buenas comunidades trabajan para otorgar ayuda yPara dar un respiro a los oprimidos, a veces (debido a la crisis económica, el hambre o la guerra) las filas de los menos afortunados exceden la capacidad de la comunidad para mantenerlos. En sociedades despiadadas, neutrales y malvadas, la pobreza se considera una inevitabilidad que nunca podrá ser erradicada del todo, o peor aún, como una herramienta que se puede manipular para obtener beneficios políticos.

action->Beat a Retreat.name: Batirse en retirada
action->Beat a Retreat.description: El mendigo da tres zancadas y obtiene un bono de circunstancia +2 a la CA durante esas acciones.

Bodyguard.name: Guardaespaldas
Bodyguard.publicNotes:
Contratados para proteger a alguien famoso o poderoso, los guardaespaldas utilizan la intimidación, el ingenio rápido y la habilidad marcial para mantener a sus protegidos a salvo. Estos mercenarios podrían ser auxiliares de la propia guardia de un noble, pero con directivas especiales para salvaguardar a sus patrones.

Una categoría amplia que incluye a aquellos que empuñan armas, hechizos o incluso astucia y astucia, los mercenarios se contratan a sí mismos y su experiencia a aquellos que tienen el oro para pagarlos.

weapon->Greatclub.name: Greatclub
weapon->Greatclub.description: While many greatclubs are intricately carved, others are little more than a sturdy tree branch. These massive clubs are too heavy to wield with only one hand.

weapon->Sap.name: Sap
weapon->Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

action->Bodyguard's Defense.name: Defensa del guardaespaldas
action->Bodyguard's Defense.description:
El guardaespaldas selecciona una criatura que puede ver y oír dentro de 30 pies. Esa criatura obtiene un bono de circunstancia +2 a la CA siempre que el guardaespaldas esté adyacente a la criatura elegida y pueda actuar; esta bonificación dura hasta el inicio del siguiente turno del guardaespaldas.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.IfUod2VxNmZMGGPq]{Effect: Bodyguard's Defense}

Bosun.name: Contramaestre
Bosun.publicNotes:
El contramaestre o contramaestre de un barco dirige a los marineros que mantienen el barco.

Los aventureros pueden necesitar pasaje en un barco rápido, o pueden enfrentarse al peligro de asaltantes en el mar o en asentamientos costeros.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

weapon->Naval Pike.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]
pica naval
weapon->Naval Pike.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

action->Bosun's Command.name: Comando del contramaestre
action->Bosun's Command.description:
Frecuencia una vez por ronda

Efecto El contramaestre ordena a un aliado atacar o ponerse en posición. Hasta el final del siguiente turno del aliado, el contramaestre puede elegir entre una bonificación de estado de +2 a las tiradas de ataque o una bonificación de estado de +10 pies a sus velocidades.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.WfiaKdXNSxC3POcs]{Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.yG27Ixwdpxqbrhzf]{Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus}

action->Pike and Strike.name: Lucio y huelga
action->Pike and Strike.description:
El contramaestre golpea con su pica naval.

Si este golpe impacta, el contramaestre puede mover el objetivo 5 pies dentro del alcance de la pica o realizar un golpe con el puño contra el objetivo sin aumentar su penalización de ataque múltiple hasta después del golpe con el puño.

Bounty Hunter.name: Cazarrecompensas
Bounty Hunter.publicNotes:
Los cazarrecompensas están en constante movimiento, ya sea dentro de las murallas de la ciudad o en la naturaleza, siguiendo a sus presas fugitivas para capturarlas... o eliminarlas. A menudo, confiando tanto en el sigilo o el engaño como en las habilidades marciales, los cazarrecompensas emplean una amplia gama de talentos para lograr sus objetivos, sin mencionar el considerable pago que sigue.

Una categoría amplia que incluye a aquellos que empuñan armas, hechizos o incluso astucia y astucia, mercenarios contratados.ellos mismos y su experiencia a aquellos que tienen el oro para pagarlo.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Falchion.name: Falchion
weapon->Falchion.description: This weapon is a heavier, two-handed version of the curved-bladed scimitar. It is weighted toward the blade's end, making it a powerful slashing weapon.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment->Manacles (Simple).name: Manacles (Simple)
equipment->Manacles (Simple).description: You can manacle someone who is willing or otherwise at your mercy as an exploration activity taking 10-30 seconds depending on the creature's size and how many manacles you apply. A two-legged creature with its legs bound takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds, and a two-handed creature with its wrists bound has to succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] any time it uses a manipulate action or else that action fails. This DC may be higher depending on how tightly the manacles constrain the hands. A creature bound to a stationary object is immobilized. For creatures with more or fewer limbs, the GM determines what effect manacles have, if any. Freeing a creature from simple manacles requires three successful @Check[thievery|dc:22|traits:action:pick-a-lock] checks.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

action->Hunt Prey.name: Cazar presas
action->Hunt Prey.description: El cazarrecompensas designa como presa a una única criatura que puede ver y oír, o una a la que está rastreando. El cazarrecompensas obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +2 a las pruebas de Percepción de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} la presa y a las pruebas de Supervivencia de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} la presa. Este efecto dura hasta que el cazarrecompensas use Hunt Prey nuevamente.

action->Precision Edge.name: Borde de precisión
action->Precision Edge.description: La primera vez que el cazarrecompensas golpea a su presa cazada en una ronda, inflige 1d8 de daño de precisión adicional.

action->Running Reload.name: Ejecutando recarga
action->Running Reload.description: El cazarrecompensas da zancadas, pasos o se escabulle y luego interactúa para recargar.

Burglar.name: Ladrón
Burglar.publicNotes:
Los ladrones se especializan en allanamiento de morada para robar casas y negocios. Estos delincuentes se centran en obtener acceso a edificios seguros y evitar trampas y otras medidas de seguridad sin ser detectados en todo momento.

Algunos delincuentes son desesperados que no tienen otra opción que violar la ley para sobrevivir, mientras que otros eligen una vida delictiva por emociones fuertes, formando pandillas o gremios del hampa que se especializan en ciertas empresas ilegales.
Burglar.saveDetails: +1 circunstancia a todas las salvaciones contra trampas.

weapon->Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
weapon->Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Sap.name: Sap
weapon->Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

weapon->Shortsword.name: Shortsword
weapon->Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment->Climbing Kit.name: Climbing Kit
equipment->Climbing Kit.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.9UJbMaglf35GVzaZ]

Este bolso incluye 50 pies de cuerda, poleas, una docena de pitones, un martillo, un gancho de agarre y un juego de crampones. Los kits de escalada te permiten sujetarte a la pared que estás escalando, moviéndote la mitad de rápido de lo habitual (mínimo 5 pies) pero permitiéndote intentar un @Check[type:flat|dc:5] siempre que no puedas evitar una caída de manera crítica. Un solo kit sólo tiene materiales suficientes para un escalador; cada escalador necesita suequipo propio.

equipment->Thieves' Tools.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]
Herramientas de ladrones
equipment->Thieves' Tools.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]

Necesitas herramientas de ladrón para forzar cerraduras o desactivar dispositivos (de algunos tipos) usando la habilidad Robo.

Si las herramientas de tus ladrones están rotas, puedes repararlas reemplazando las ganzúas con @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{Replacement Picks} apropiadas para tus herramientas; esto no requiere usar la acción Reparar.

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

consumable->Darkvision Elixir (Lesser).name: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
consumable->Darkvision Elixir (Lesser).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.88pGCHV0uKMskTVO]

Activar 1 Interactuar

Después de beber este elixir, tu vista se vuelve más aguda en la oscuridad. Obtienes visión en la oscuridad durante 10 minutos.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.7UL8belWmo7U5YGM]{Effect: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)}

action->+11 Bonus on Perception to Find.name: +11 Bonus on Perception to Find Traps

action->+1 Circumstance to All Saves vs..name: +1 Circunstancia a todas las salvaciones contra trampas

action->Deny Advantage.name: Negar ventaja
action->Deny Advantage.description: El ladrón no está desprevenido ante criaturas de nivel 4 o inferior que están @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No detectado} , flanquean o usan @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{Surprise Attack} .

action->Nimble Dodge.name: Esquiva ágil
action->Nimble Dodge.description:
Activador El ladrón es atacado cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia por un atacante que puede ver.

Efecto El ladrón obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +2 a la CA contra el ataque desencadenante.

action->Mobility.name: Movilidad
action->Mobility.description: Cuando el ladrón da zancadas a la mitad de su velocidad o menos, ese movimiento no desencadena reacciones.

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

El ladrón inflige 1d6 de daño de precisión extra a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

action->Surprise Attack.name: Ataque sorpresa
action->Surprise Attack.description: En la primera ronda de combate, si el ladrón tira Engaño o Sigilo para obtener iniciativa, las criaturas que no han actuado son @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} para él.

Captain Of The Guard.name: Capitán de la guardia
Captain Of The Guard.publicNotes:
El capitán de la guardia lidera una tropa de soldados que sirven como fuerzas de seguridad para un individuo poderoso, generalmente un noble de alto rango o un comerciante muy rico, aunque este bloque de estadísticas también podría representar a un capitán de la guardia de menor rango para el líder de una nación. Un oponente formidable por derecho propio, el capitán de la guardia emplea hábilmente a sus tropas para proteger la vida y la salud de su pupilo.

Las sociedades más grandes dependen de esoscon la autoridad y la capacidad de interpretar y hacer cumplir las leyes. En sociedades bien alineadas, estos funcionarios desempeñan sus funciones de manera justa. En los países neutrales y malvados, estos funcionarios pueden ser duros y crueles (con una alineación alterada para reflejar esto), imponiendo severos castigos a aquellos que no pueden pagar por la misericordia.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

weapon->Longsword.name: Longsword
weapon->Longsword.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]

Las espadas largas pueden ser espadas de uno o dos filos. Sus hojas son pesadas y miden entre 3 y 4 pies de largo.

shield->Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
shield->Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

armor->Full Plate.name: Full Plate
armor->Full Plate.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]

La malla de placas consiste en placas entrelazadas que encierran casi todo el cuerpo en un caparazón de acero. Es costoso y pesado, y el usuario a menudo requiere ayuda para ponérselo correctamente, pero proporciona la mejor armadura defensiva que puede ofrecer. Un traje de esta armadura viene con una capa interna de armadura acolchada y un par de guanteletes.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

action->Aura of Command.name: Aura de mando
action->Aura of Command.description:
30 pies. El capitán de la guardia refuerza a los guardias de nivel inferior bajo su mando, otorgándoles una bonificación de estado de +1 a sus tiradas de ataque y una bonificación de estado de +2 a sus salvaciones de Voluntad.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.T9wQ1LvsvPWTefQR]{Effect: Under Command}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.OxOMYmlPtjsEkRtY]{Effect: Aura of Command}

action->Bravery.name: Valentía
action->Bravery.description: Cuando el capitán de la guardia obtiene un éxito en una salvación de Voluntad contra un efecto de miedo, en su lugar obtiene un éxito crítico. Además, cada vez que obtengan la condición @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado}, reduzcan su valor en 1.

action->Shield Warden.name: Guardián del escudo
action->Shield Warden.description: Cuando el capitán tiene su escudo levantado, puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.m4HQ2o5aPxjXf2kY]{Shield Block} cuando se realiza un ataque contra un aliado adyacente. Si lo hacen, el escudo evita que ese aliado reciba daño en lugar del capitán.

action->Shielded Advance.name: Avance blindado
action->Shielded Advance.description:
Requisitos El capitán de la guardia tiene el escudo en alto

Efecto El capitán de la guardia avanza, usando su escudo para hacer retroceder a los enemigos.

El capitán Strides y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoves}, en cualquier orden. La penalización por ataque múltiple no se aplica a este empujón, aunque el empujón sí cuenta para la penalización por ataque múltiple del capitán.

Changeling Hellknight.name: Caballero Infernal Cambiante
Changeling Hellknight.saveDetails: +2 circunstancia a todas las salvaciones vs. soñar y dormir

spell->Flaming Sphere.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ZdHjnpEQJuqOYSG]
Esfera llameante
spell->Flaming Sphere.description:
You create a sphere of flame in a square within range. The sphere must be supported by a solid surface, such as a stone floor. The sphere deals 3d6 fire damage to each creature in the square where it first appears; each creature must attempt a basic Reflex save. On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain this Spell, you can leave the sphere in its square or roll it to another square within range. It deals 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to each creature in that square.

Creatures that succeed at their save take no damage (instead of half).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Resist Energy.name: Resist Energy
spell->Resist Energy.description:
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can target up to five creatures.

spell->Burning Hands.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y6rAdMK6EFlV6U0t]
Manos ardientes
spell->Burning Hands.description:
Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

spell->Dancing Lights.name: Luces danzantes
spell->Dancing Lights.description: Creas hasta cuatro luces flotantes, ninguna de las cuales está a más de 10 pies de distancia. Cada uno arroja luz como una antorcha. Cuando sostienes el hechizo, puedes mover cualquier cantidad de luces hasta 60 pies. Cada luz debe permanecer a 120 pies de usted y a 10 pies de todas las demás, o parpadeará.

spell->Elemental Toss.name: Elemental Toss
spell->Elemental Toss.description:
With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire) on a success, and double damage on a critical success. This spell has your element's trait.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

spell->Longstrider.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]
Zancudo largo
spell->Longstrider.description:
You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PQHP7Oph3BQX1GhF]{Spell Effect: Tailwind}

Heightened (2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours.

spell->Produce Flame.name: Produce Flame
spell->Produce Flame.description:
A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach.

On a success, you deal 2d4 fire damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

spell->Tanglefoot.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]
Pie enredado
spell->Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

spell->Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
spell->Ventriloquism.description:
Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

weapon->Halberd.name: Halberd
weapon->Halberd.description: This polearm has a relatively short, 5-foot shaft. The business end is a long spike with an axe blade attached.

armor->Splint Mail.name: Splint Mail
armor->Splint Mail.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6AhDKX1dwRwFpQsU]

Este tipo de armadura es una cota de malla reforzada con placas de metal flexibles y entrelazadas, generalmente ubicadas en el torso, la parte superior de los brazos y las piernas del usuario. Un traje de esta armadura viene con una capa interna de armadura acolchada y un par de guanteletes.

action->+2 Circumstance to All Saves vs..name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kquBnQ0kObZztnBc]
+2 Circunstancia a todas las salvaciones vs. Sueño y Dormir

Charlatan.name: Charlatán
Charlatan.publicNotes:
Los charlatanes utilizan la simulación y la mala dirección para estafar dinero y otros objetos de valor a los crédulos y confundidos. Vender aceite de serpiente (literal o figurativamente), distraer a las marcas para robarse los bolsillos o fingir mediumnidad son estafas clásicas.

Algunos delincuentes son desesperados que no tienen otra opción que violar la ley para sobrevivir, mientras que otros eligen una vida delictiva por emociones fuertes, formando pandillas o gremios del hampa que se especializan en ciertos delitos ilegales.empresas.

spell->Invisibility.name: Invisibility
spell->Invisibility.description:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

spell->Charm.name: Charm
spell->Charm.description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Counter Performance.name: Counter Performance
spell->Counter Performance.description:
Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect.

Your performance protects you and your allies. Roll a Performance check for a type you know: an auditory performance if the trigger was auditory, or a visual one for a visual trigger. You and allies in the area can use the better result between your Performance check and the saving throw.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
spell->Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
spell->Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate: Deception} use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (3rd) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise}

spell->Inspire Courage.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]
Inspirar coraje
spell->Inspire Courage.description:
You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem}

spell->Mage Hand.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]
Mano de mago
spell->Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.
spell->Mage Hand.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

spell->Magic Aura.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PRrZ7anETWPm90YY]
Aura mágica
spell->Magic Aura.description:
You alter the appearance of an item's magic aura. You can choose to have the target's aura appear as that of common magic item of twice magic aura's level or lower, or to have it register as being under the effects of a spell of your choice of magic aura's level or lower. If the target is magical, you can instead choose to have it appear as entirely non-magical. A caster using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura} of an equal or higher spell rank can attempt to disbelieve the illusion from magic aura. Magic aura doesn't mask the aura of spells that are 9th level or higher or of items that are 19th level or higher.

Heightened (3rd) You can target a creature instead of an object. When you do, you can either conceal the auras of all magic items it has or have that creature's aura appear as if it were under the effect of a spell you know.

spell->Message.name: Message
spell->Message.description:
You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you.

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

Heightened (3rd) The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

spell->Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
spell->Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

spell->Unseen Servant.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]
Sirviente invisible
spell->Unseen Servant.description:
You summon an unseen servant, which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.

Unseen Servant [Creature] [-1] [No Alignment] [Medium]

AC 13, Fort +0, Ref +4, Will +0 HP 4

Immunities disease, mental, non-magical attacks, paralysis, poison, precision, unconscious

Resistances all damage 5 (except force or ghost touch)

Speed fly 30 feet

Force Body An unseen servant's physical body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can't pass through solid objects.

spell->Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
spell->Ventriloquism.description:
Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

weapon->Sap.name: Sap
weapon->Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

weapon->Shortsword.name: Shortsword
weapon->Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

equipment->Disguise Kit.name: Disguise Kit
equipment->Disguise Kit.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Jvp0x2Sc82WVpExT]

Esta pequeña caja de madera contiene cosméticos, vello facial postizo, goma de mascar y algunas pelucas sencillas. Por lo general, necesitas un kit de disfraz para disfrazarte y hacerte pasar por alguien usando la habilidad Engaño. Si has creado una gran cantidad de disfraces, puedes reponer tu suministro de cosméticos con cosméticos de repuesto adecuados para el tipo de tu kit de disfraces.

equipment->Lute.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MPv5Yx4w7scZGj2Y]
Laúd
equipment->Lute.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played.

equipment->Thieves' Tools.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]
Herramientas de ladrones
equipment->Thieves' Tools.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]

Necesitas herramientas de ladrón para forzar cerraduras o desactivar dispositivos (de algunos tipos) usando la habilidad Robo.

Si las herramientas de tus ladrones están rotas, puedes repararlas reemplazando las ganzúas con @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{Replacement Picks} apropiadas para tus herramientas; esto no requiere usar la acción Reparar.

action->Versatile Performance.name: Rendimiento versátil
action->Versatile Performance.description: El charlatán puede utilizar Actuación en lugar de Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} y ​​en lugar de Intimidación para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} . También pueden utilizar una actuación en lugar de un engaño para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} .

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

El charlatán inflige 1d6 de daño de precisión extra a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

Charming Scoundrel.name: Sinvergüenza encantador
Charming Scoundrel.publicNotes:
Este atractivo gnomo luce un peinado impresionante y un disfraz llamativo que llama la atención.

Si bien la mayoría de los Firebrands disfrutan de la atención que atraen sus hazañas, el encantador sinvergüenza lleva esto al extremo, a menudo alardeando de sus atrevidas hazañas e intentando convertir historias de sus notorias hazañas en bebidas o alojamiento gratis. El sinvergüenza no ve ningún daño en atribuirse el mérito de cualquier actividad atribuida a la organización,siempre que la intervención de las autoridades locales parezca improbable. Es probable que acepten trabajos de alto perfil para los Firebrands sólo por la emoción de contar más tarde los pequeños apuros de su aventura.

El encantador sinvergüenza es tan dramático en el combate como fuera de él, a menudo lanzándose de oponente en oponente y desorientando a los enemigos con llamativos juegos de espada. Si una batalla va bien, el sinvergüenza a menudo grita burlas a los oponentes lentos o los alienta a seguir adelante.aliados. Si bien es orgulloso y competitivo, el sinvergüenza es un pragmático de corazón y optará por agregar una historia de un escape astuto a su repertorio si las probabilidades parecen estar en su contra.

Dondequiera que se pueda encontrar opresión o una oportunidad para una aventura atrevida, se puede encontrar a los Firebrands persiguiéndolos. Los PJ pueden considerar que los Firebrands son aliados en una búsqueda de una rebelión justa o de justicia contra la esclavitud, o pueden encontrar que estos apuestos temerarios sonrivales amistosos -o no tan amigables- por el mismo tesoro. El encantador sinvergüenza que se presenta aquí podría fácilmente ser un luchador por la libertad de bajo nivel o un complemento para los PJ, o podría servir como tripulación del capitán corsario. El capitán corsario puede servir como un transporte dispuesto a llevar a los PJ a los lugares más peligrosos, un aliado intermitente que proporciona un rescate oportuno cuando menos se espera, un explorador competidor o un enemigo poderoso y mortal.

weapon->Hand Crossbow.name: Hand Crossbow
weapon->Hand Crossbow.description: Sometimes referred to as an alley bow by rogues or ruffians, this small crossbow fires small bolts that are sometimes used to deliver poison to the target. It's small enough to be shot one-handed, but it still requires two hands to load.

weapon->Sap.name: Sap
weapon->Sap.description: A sap has a soft wrapping around a dense core, typically a leather sheath around a lead rod. Its head is wider than its grip to disperse the force of a blow, as the weapon's purpose is to knock out its victim rather than to draw blood.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

action->Deny Advantage.name: Negar ventaja
action->Deny Advantage.description: El sinvergüenza encantador no es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} para flanquear, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} , o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{No detectado} criaturas de 4.º nivel o inferior, o criaturas de 4.º nivel o inferior que usan ataques sorpresa.

action->Advancing Flourish.name: Avanzando en florecimiento
action->Advancing Flourish.description: El encantador sinvergüenza Da dos zancadas. Si terminan su movimiento dentro del alcance cuerpo a cuerpo de un enemigo, pueden @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} .

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

El encantador sinvergüenza inflige 2d6 de daño de precisión adicional a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

Chronicler.name: Cronista
Chronicler.publicNotes:
La exploración significa muy poco si no existe una explicación de los detalles. Los miembros de bandas aventureras aprecian a los cronistas que registran historias de sus hazañas.

El mundo es un lugar amplio y abierto, lleno de peligros y aventuras. Los exploradores utilizan su conocimiento de la naturaleza y sus habilidades de supervivencia para ver cada rincón de la tierra.

spell->Entangle.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]
Enredar
spell->Entangle.description: Plants in the area entangle creatures. The area counts as difficult terrain. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round. Creatures can attempt to Escape at entangle's DC to remove these effects.

spell->Flaming Sphere.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ZdHjnpEQJuqOYSG]
Esfera llameante
spell->Flaming Sphere.description:
You create a sphere of flame in a square within range. The sphere must be supported by a solid surface, such as a stone floor. The sphere deals 3d6 fire damage to each creature in the square where it first appears; each creature must attempt a basic Reflex save. On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain this Spell, you can leave the sphere in its square or roll it to another square within range. It deals 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to each creature in that square.

Creatures that succeed at their save take no damage (instead of half).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Fleet Step.name: Fleet Step
spell->Fleet Step.description:
You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ThFug45WHkQQXcoF]{Spell Effect: Fleet Step}

spell->Know Direction.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]
Conozca la dirección
spell->Know Direction.description:
In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location).

Heightened (7th) You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Longstrider.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]
Zancudo largo
spell->Longstrider.description:
You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PQHP7Oph3BQX1GhF]{Spell Effect: Tailwind}

Heightened (2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours.

spell->Pass Without Trace.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]
Pasar sin rastro
spell->Pass Without Trace.description:
You obscure the tracks you leave behind and make it harder for others to find you. The DC of checks to Track you gains a +4 status bonus or is equal to your spell DC, whichever results in a higher DC. You can benefit from only one pass without trace spell at a time.

Heightened (2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours.

Heightened (4th) The duration increases to 8 hours. The spell has a range of 20 feet and an area of a 20-foot-emanation, affecting up to 10 creatures of your choice within that area.

spell->Ray of Frost.name: Ray of Frost
spell->Ray of Frost.description:
You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals 2d4 cold damage.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Spell Effect: Ray of Frost}

Success The target takes normal damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

spell->Sigil.name: Sigil
spell->Sigil.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your heightened level.

Heightened (3rd) The sigil instead fades after 1 month.

Heightened (5th) The sigil instead fades after 1 year.

Heightened (7th) The sigil never fades.

spell->Tanglefoot.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]
Pie enredado
spell->Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

weapon->Staff.name: Staff
weapon->Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment->Journal.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.i2JwyZJpVZhlOObL]
Diario
equipment->Journal.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.i2JwyZJpVZhlOObL]

Este diario es comúnmente utilizado por eruditos aventureros y navegantes de barcos para registrar sus viajes.

equipment->Map.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UhcRWtnjU2WLSClx]
Mapa
equipment->Map.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UhcRWtnjU2WLSClx]

Los mapas son poco comunes. La mayoría de los mapas que puedes encontrar son simples y funcionales. Un mapa topográfico detalla una única ubicación con excelente detalle.

Uno de estos mapas te otorga una bonificación de elemento +1 a las pruebas de Supervivencia y a cualquier prueba de habilidad para Recuperar conocimientos, siempre que las pruebas estén relacionadas con la ubicación detallada en el mapa.

El DJ determina qué mapas están disponibles en cualquierubicación.

1.label: Mapa topográfico (recuperar conocimientos sobre el área cartografiada)

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

consumable->Scroll of Acid Arrow (Level.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]
Pergamino de Flecha Ácida (Nivel 2)
consumable->Scroll of Acid Arrow (Level.consumableSpellDescription:
You conjure an arrow of acid that keeps corroding the target after it hits. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 3d8 acid damage plus @Damage[1d6[persistent,acid]] damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Daño persistente}.

Heightened (+2) The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Daño persistente} increases by 1d6.
consumable->Scroll of Acid Arrow (Level.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}

Lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino requiere sostener el pergamino en una mano y activarlo con una actividad de Lanzar un hechizo usando el número normal de acciones para ese hechizo.

Para lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino, el hechizo debe aparecer en tu lista de hechizos. Como eres tú quien lanza el hechizo, usa tu tirada de ataque de hechizo ydeletrea DC. El hechizo también obtiene el rasgo apropiado para tu tradición (arcana, divina, oculta o primordial).

Todos los componentes materiales físicos y los costos se proporcionan cuando se crea un pergamino, por lo que no es necesario proporcionarlos al lanzar un hechizo a partir de un pergamino. Debes reemplazar cualquier componente material requerido para ese hechizo con un componente somático. Si el hechizo requiere un enfoque, debes tener ese enfoque para lanzar el hechizo desde un pergamino.

Nota: Para crear un pergamino o varita de un hechizo específico, arrastre el hechizo desde el compendio o navegador de compendio al inventario de un PC, NPC o actor de botín.

consumable->Scroll of Heal (Level 1).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RjuupS9xyXDLgyIr]
Pergamino de curación (nivel 1)
consumable->Scroll of Heal (Level 1).consumableSpellDescription:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 Action (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 Actions (somatic, verbal) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 Actions (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
consumable->Scroll of Heal (Level 1).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RjuupS9xyXDLgyIr]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}

Lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino requiere sostener el pergamino en una mano y activarlo con una actividad de Lanzar un hechizo usando el número normal de acciones para ese hechizo.

Para lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino, el hechizo debe aparecer en tu lista de hechizos. Como eres tú quien lanza el hechizo, usa tu tirada de ataque de hechizo ydeletrea DC. El hechizo también obtiene el rasgo apropiado para tu tradición (arcana, divina, oculta o primordial).

Todos los componentes materiales físicos y los costos se proporcionan cuando se crea un pergamino, por lo que no es necesario proporcionarlos al lanzar un hechizo a partir de un pergamino. Debes reemplazar cualquier componente material requerido para ese hechizo con un componente somático. Si el hechizo requiere un enfoque, debes tener ese enfoque para lanzar el hechizo desde un pergamino.

Nota: Para crear un pergamino o varita de un hechizo específico, arrastre el hechizo desde el compendio o navegador de compendio al inventario de un PC, NPC o actor de botín.

action->Live to Tell the Tale.name: Vive para contarlo
action->Live to Tell the Tale.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Desencadenante El cronista es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Moribundo}

Efecto El cronista reduce su condición de muerte en 1. Si el cronista ya no está muriendo, permanece @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} durante al menos 1 hora o hasta que recupere 1 punto de vida.

action->Scroll Mastery.name: Dominio del desplazamiento
action->Scroll Mastery.description: El cronista puede activar cualquier pergamino de un hechizo de segundo rango o inferior como si tuviera el hechizo en su lista de hechizos, independientemente de su tradición mágica.

Commoner.name: Plebeyo
Commoner.publicNotes:
Aunque no todos los plebeyos están oprimidos, muchos viven duras vidas de trabajo duro mientras trabajan para mantener a sus familias alimentadas y alojadas en relativa comodidad. Si bien muchos plebeyos son gente sencilla que se mantiene reservada, a veces los plebeyos se rebelan, ya sea levantándose para enfrentar a sus opresores o persuadidos o incluso engañados para que se unan a planes nefastos y conspiraciones criminales. Los plebeyos se benefician del poder en número, y una multitud de plebeyos puede lograr mucho más que sus gobernantes.esperar.

Desafortunadamente, cada sociedad tiene personas que viven al margen. Si bien las buenas comunidades trabajan para brindar ayuda y respiro a los oprimidos, a veces (debido a una crisis económica, una hambruna o una guerra) las filas de los menos afortunados exceden la capacidad de la comunidad para apoyarlos. En sociedades despiadadas, neutrales y malvadas, la pobreza se considera una inevitabilidad que nunca podrá ser erradicada del todo, o peor aún, como una herramienta que se puede manipular para obtener beneficios políticos.

weapon->Sickle.name: Sickle
weapon->Sickle.description: Originally a farming tool used for reaping grain, this one-handed weapon has a short wooden handle ending in a curved blade, sometimes sharpened on both sides.

action->Power of the Mob.name: El poder de la mafia
action->Power of the Mob.description: Cuando tres o más plebeyos están adyacentes entre sí, cada plebeyo obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +1 a las pruebas de Atletismo de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, tiradas de ataque y tiradas de daño.

Cult Leader.name: Líder de culto
Cult Leader.publicNotes:
Una carrera de logros místicos combinada con una vida de subterfugios e intimidación ha elevado a este ocultista a una posición poderosa.

Aquellos iniciados en las verdades ocultas y los secretos prohibidos del mundo se transforman para siempre, o eso afirman. Para el cínico, un místico no es más que un charlatán o un fanático. Otros afirman sentir un aura alrededor de tales luminarias y las tratan con reverencia, para que no ofendan a algún presagio.de una fatalidad indescriptible.

spell->Dimension Door.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]
Puerta de dimensión
spell->Dimension Door.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

spell->Glibness.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]
Labia
spell->Glibness.description: Falsehoods pass your lips as smoothly as silk. You gain a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie and against Perception checks to discern if you are telling the truth, and you add your level even if you're untrained. If the implausibility of your lies prompts a circumstance penalty or a DC increase, reduce that penalty or increase by half.

spell->Outcast's Curse.name: Outcast's Curse
spell->Outcast's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that makes its presence abrasive and off-putting. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check, and creatures they encounter have an initial attitude toward them of one step worse (for instance, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Unfriendly} instead of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]{Indifferent}).

Failure As success, but the effect is permanent.

Critical Failure As failure, and creatures that the target encounters have an initial attitude toward them of two steps worse.

spell->Suggestion.name: Suggestion
spell->Suggestion.description:
Your honeyed words are difficult for creatures to resist. You suggest a course of action to the target, which must be phrased in such a way as to seem like a logical course of action to the target and can't be self-destructive or obviously against the target's self-interest. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and knows you tried to control it.

Success The target is unaffected and thinks you were talking to them normally, not casting a spell on them.
