This counts as having taken sufficient preparatory actions to Aid your ally on a skill check of your choice, regardless of the circumstances. When you later use the Aid reaction, you can roll Performance instead of the normal skill check, and if you roll a failure, you get a success instead. If you are legendary in Performance, you automatically critically succeed.

The GM might rule that you can't use this ability if the act of encouraging your ally would interfere with the skill check (such as a check to Sneak quietly or maintain a disguise).

spell->Inspire Courage.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]
Inspirar coraje
spell->Inspire Courage.description:
You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem}

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

weapon->Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
weapon->Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Warhammer.name: Warhammer
weapon->Warhammer.description: This weapon has a wooden shaft ending in a large, heavy metal head. The head of the hammer might be single-sided or double-sided, but it's always capable of delivering powerful bludgeoning blows.

shield->Sturdy Shield (Minor).name: Sturdy Shield (Minor)
shield->Sturdy Shield (Minor).description:
With a superior design and excellent craftsmanship, this steel shield has higher Hardness than its non-magical counterparts, making it harder to break and destroy.

The shield has Hardness 8, HP 64, and BT 32.

armor->Half Plate.name: Half Plate
armor->Half Plate.description: Half plate consists of most of the upper body plates used in full plate, with lighter or sparser steel plate protection for the arms and legs. This provides some of the protection of full plate with greater flexibility and speed. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]{Padded Armor} and a pair of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ix2vicchE79d6Cl3]{gauntlets}.

equipment->Wayfinder.name: Wayfinder
equipment->Wayfinder.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]

Esta brújula compacta reutiliza tecnología antigua para extraer poderes fantásticos de misteriosos objetos mágicos llamados piedras eón. Sirve como insignia de cargo para los agentes de la Sociedad Pathfinder y como símbolo de estatus entre aventureros de cualquier tipo. Un buscador de rutas funciona como una brújula.

Una hendidura en el medio del buscador puede contener un solo piedra del eón . Colocar una piedra de eón en esta hendidura le brinda todos los beneficios de tener la piedra de eón orbitando su cabeza, pero protege la piedra para que no sea notada o robada con la misma facilidad. Inviertes un wayfinder y ​​la piedra de eón dentro de él simultáneamente, y cuentan como solo un elemento para tu límite de investidura. Una piedra de eón invertida colocado en un wayfinder también otorga su poder de resonancia.

Si tienes más de un wayfinder con una piedra de eón invertida en tu persona en un momento dado, la interferencia destructiva de su resonancia te impide obtener beneficios de cualquiera de ellos. Aún puedes beneficiarte de piedras de eón adicionales que orbitan alrededor de tu cabeza, pero no en buscadores de caminos .

Activar Un comando

Efecto El buscador es el objetivo de un hechizo de primer rango @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}.

effect->Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Effect: Raise a Shield
effect->Effect: Raise a Shield.description: You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.

action->Fortitude Saves.name: La fortaleza salva
action->Fortitude Saves.description: Los éxitos se consideran éxitos críticos

action->Unshakable.name: Inquebrantable
action->Unshakable.description: Cada vez que el capitán de riesgo obtiene la condición @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado}, reduce su valor en 1.

action->Bardic Lore.name: Conocimiento bárdico
action->Bardic Lore.description: El capitán de aventura puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} sobre cualquier tema usando su habilidad Bardic Lore.

action->Paragon's Guard.name: Guardia de Paragon
action->Paragon's Guard.description: Mientras el capitán del venture está en esta postura y empuñando un escudo, su escudo siempre está levantado.

action->Weapon Mastery (Hammer).name: Dominio de armas (martillo)
action->Weapon Mastery (Hammer).description: El capitán del venture ha pasado horas entrenando con el martillo. Obtienen acceso al efecto de especialización crítica de todos los martillos simples y marciales.

Physician.name: Médico
Physician.publicNotes:
El arte de la medicina es una mezcla de lo intelectual y lo práctico, y se ocupa de cómo funcionan las enfermedades y cómo prevenirlas. Se puede encontrar al médico consultando tomos muy usados ​​mientras examina meticulosamente a los pacientes para comprender mejor su condición, antes de determinar el tratamiento más efectivo. Para asuntos médicos, el médico es un desafío de 4to nivel.

El mundo es un lugar peligroso. Afortunadamente, hay quienes dedican suvidas para aliviar el dolor y el sufrimiento de los demás.

equipment->Healer's Tools.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]
Herramientas del sanador
equipment->Healer's Tools.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]

Este kit de vendajes, hierbas y herramientas de sutura es necesario para realizar controles de medicamentos para administrar primeros auxilios, tratar enfermedades, tratar venenos o tratar heridas.

consumable->Elixir of Life (Minor).name: Elixir de vida (menor)
consumable->Elixir of Life (Minor).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]

Activar A Interactuar

Los elixires de vida aceleran los procesos naturales de curación y el sistema inmunológico de una criatura viviente. Al beber este elixir, recuperas [[/r 1d6[healing]]] puntos de vida y obtienes una bonificación de +1 por objeto a las tiradas de salvación contra enfermedades y venenos durante 10 minutos.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor)}

treasure->Medical Textbook.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.G5WuYX1ghrZcJ1J1]
Libro de texto médico

action->+2 Bonus on Perception to Notice.name: +2 Bonus on Perception to Notice ailments

action->Bedside Manner.name: Comportamiento con un enfermo
action->Bedside Manner.description: Un médico tiene un bonificador +2 de circunstancia a las pruebas de Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} o hacer un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} de una criatura enferma, envenenada o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Herido}.

0.label: El objetivo está enfermo, envenenado o herido.

action->Doctor's Hand.name: La mano del médico
action->Doctor's Hand.description: Cuando el médico obtiene un fallo crítico en una prueba de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} , en su lugar obtiene un fallo.

Pirate.name: Pirata
Pirate.publicNotes:
Estos azotes de los mares son una amenaza para cualquiera que pase tiempo lejos de la tierra.

Los aventureros pueden necesitar pasaje en un barco rápido, o pueden enfrentarse al peligro de asaltantes en el mar o en asentamientos costeros.

weapon->Cutlass.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]
Chafarote
weapon->Cutlass.description: This one-handed curved blade is sharp on one side.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

armor->Padded Armor.name: Padded Armor
armor->Padded Armor.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]

Esta armadura es simplemente una capa de tela pesada y acolchada, pero a veces se usa porque es muy económica. La armadura acolchada es más fácil de dañar y destruir que otros tipos de armadura. La armadura pesada viene con una capa interna acolchada incluida en su precio, aunque pierde el rasgo de comodidad cuando se usa debajo de una armadura pesada. Puedes usar sólo esa armadura acolchada o abrigo interior para dormir, si tu armadura pesada esdestruido, o cuando no lleva la armadura pesada completa. Esto te permite mantener la armadura puesta y beneficiarte del poder de cualquier runa en la armadura pesada asociada, pero nadie más puede usar tu armadura pesada sin la capa interna acolchada.

action->Bravery.name: Valentía
action->Bravery.description: Cuando el pirata obtiene un éxito en una salvación de Voluntad contra un efecto de miedo, en su lugar obtiene un éxito crítico. Además, cada vez que obtengan la condición @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado}, reduzcan su valor en 1.

action->Boarding Action.name: Acción de embarque
action->Boarding Action.description: El pirata se balancea sobre una cuerda o zancadas, moviéndose hacia arriba para duplicar su velocidad. Si el pirata abordó o desembarcó de un barco durante este movimiento, puede realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo al final de su movimiento que inflige un dado de daño adicional por cada golpe.

Plague Doctor.name: Doctor de plaga
Plague Doctor.publicNotes:
Estos curanderos, a menudo vistos con máscaras distintivas y polvos ardientes para defenderse de las plagas transmitidas por el aire, son tan temidos como respetados. Ver a un médico especialista en plagas indica que la enfermedad ha infestado la tierra y que es posible que ya se haya apoderado de ella. A pesar de su devoto trabajo para curar a los intocables, a veces se les trata con sospecha, como si de alguna manera fueran la causa de la plaga.

El mundo es un lugar peligroso. Agradecidamente,hay quienes dedican su vida a aliviar el dolor y el sufrimiento de los demás.

spell->Neutralize Poison.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]
Neutralizar el veneno
spell->Neutralize Poison.description: You pour healing magic through the target in an attempt to cure one poison afflicting it. Attempt a counteract check against the poison.

spell->Remove Disease.name: Eliminar enfermedad
spell->Remove Disease.description: La magia curativa purga la enfermedad del cuerpo de una criatura. Intentas contrarrestar una enfermedad que afecta al objetivo.

spell->Death Knell.name: Death Knell
spell->Death Knell.description:
You snuff the life out of a creature on the brink of death. The target must attempt a Will save. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value increases by 1.

Failure The target dies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.98XT2QUk6wvXIqf7]{Spell Effect: Death Knell}

spell->Remove Fear.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EfFMLVbmkBWmzoLF]
Quitar el miedo
spell->Remove Fear.description:
With a touch, you ease a creature's fears. You can attempt to counteract a single fear effect that the target suffers from. This frees only the target, not any other creatures under the fear effect.

Heightened (6th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Restoration.name: Restoration
spell->Restoration.description:
Restorative magic counters the effects of toxins or conditions that prevent a creature from functioning at its best. When you cast restoration, choose to either reduce a condition or lessen the effect of a toxin. A creature can benefit from only one restoration spell each day, and it can't benefit from restoration more than once to reduce the stage of the same exposure to a given toxin.

  • Lessen a Toxin Reduce the stage of one toxin the target suffers from by one stage. This can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the affliction.
  • Reduce a Condition Reduce the value of the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition by 2. You can instead reduce two of the listed conditions by 1 each.

Heightened (4th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} to the list of conditions you can reduce. When you lessen a toxin, reduce the stage by two. You also gain a third option that allows you to reduce the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} value by 1. You can't use this to reduce a permanent Doomed condition.

Heightened (6th) As the 4th-rank restoration, but you can reduce a permanent Doomed condition if you add a spellcasting action and a material component while Casting the Spell, during which you provide 100 gp worth of diamond dust as a cost.

spell->Detect Poison.name: Detect Poison
spell->Detect Poison.description:
You detect whether a creature is venomous or poisonous, or if an object is poison or has been poisoned. You do not ascertain whether the target is poisonous in multiple ways, nor do you learn the type or types of poison. Certain substances, like lead and alcohol, are poisons and so mask other poisons.

Heightened (2nd) You learn the number and types of poison.

spell->Guidance.name: Guidance
spell->Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

spell->Heal.name: Heal
spell->Heal.description:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8

3 (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Healer's Blessing.name: Healer's Blessing
spell->Healer's Blessing.description:
Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to vitality energy. When the target regains Hit Points from a healing spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points. The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once.

Heightened (+1) The additional healing increases by 2 HP.

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Message.name: Message
spell->Message.description:
You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you.

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

Heightened (3rd) The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

spell->Purify Food and Drink.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qXTB7Ec9yYh5JPPV]
Purificar alimentos y bebidas
spell->Purify Food and Drink.description: You remove toxins and contaminations from food and drink, making them safe to consume. This spell doesn't prevent future contamination, natural decay, or spoilage. One cubic foot of liquid is roughly 8 gallons.
spell->Purify Food and Drink.target: 1 pie cúbico de comida o agua contaminada

spell->Sigil.name: Sigil
spell->Sigil.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your heightened level.

Heightened (3rd) The sigil instead fades after 1 month.

Heightened (5th) The sigil instead fades after 1 year.

Heightened (7th) The sigil never fades.

spell->Stabilize.name: Stabilize
spell->Stabilize.description: Vitality energy shuts death's door. The target loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition, though it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Staff.name: Staff
weapon->Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment->Healer's Tools.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]
Herramientas del sanador
equipment->Healer's Tools.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]

Este kit de vendajes, hierbas y herramientas de sutura es necesario para realizar controles de medicamentos para administrar primeros auxilios, tratar enfermedades, tratar venenos o tratar heridas.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

consumable->Healing Potion (Minor).name: Healing Potion (Minor)
consumable->Healing Potion (Minor).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]

Una poción curativa es un frasco de un líquido rojo rubí que imparte una sensación de hormigueo a medida que las heridas del bebedor sanan rápidamente. Cuando bebes una poción curativa, recuperas [[/r 1d8[healing]]] puntos de vida.

action->Healing Hands.name: Manos curativas
action->Healing Hands.description: Cuando el médico de la plaga lanza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, tira d10 en lugar de d8.

action->Improved Communal Healing.name: Curación comunitaria mejorada
action->Improved Communal Healing.description: Cuando el médico de la plaga lanza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} apuntando a una sola criatura, el médico de la plaga también restaura puntos de vida iguales al rango del hechizo para él mismo o para cualquier otra criatura dentro del alcance del hechizo.

Poacher.name: Cazador furtivo
Poacher.publicNotes:
Algunos bosques están protegidos por reyes, otros sólo por criaturas salvajes. Las leyes contra la caza pueden proteger las reservas privadas de los nobles o salvaguardar la viabilidad de las poblaciones animales de los bosques compartidos durante estaciones específicas. Los cazadores furtivos violan esas leyes, a veces por codicia, a veces por desesperación y a veces por deporte. Aunque las sanciones contra la caza furtiva a menudo incluyen la vergüenza pública, en tiempos difíciles un cazador furtivo exitoso es un héroe local.

DeDesde los bosques gestionados y cultivados que sustentan a las aldeas hasta las tierras de la corona cubiertas de árboles donde sólo los nobles y sus sirvientes pueden cazar, los bosques proporcionan. Para las comunidades, los bosques proporcionan combustible, alimentos, medicinas y materias primas, mientras que los bosques protegidos por la realeza proporcionan alimento para la mesa de los nobles y una fuente de entretenimiento en forma de cacerías organizadas. Incluso los bosques antiguos que no han sido tocados por manos o espadas mortales proporcionan a los bardos escenarios donde sucedieron leyendas y podrían volver a suceder.Muchos encuentran inquietantes las profundidades del bosque, pero otros viven entre los árboles y junto a las criaturas que allí habitan.

weapon->Club.name: Club
weapon->Club.description: This is a piece of stout wood shaped or repurposed to bludgeon an enemy. Clubs can be intricately carved pieces of martial art or as simple as a tree branch or piece of wood.

weapon->Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
weapon->Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

armor->Padded Armor.name: Padded Armor
armor->Padded Armor.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]

Esta armadura es simplemente una capa de tela pesada y acolchada, pero a veces se usa porque es muy económica. La armadura acolchada es más fácil de dañar y destruir que otros tipos de armadura. La armadura pesada viene con una capa interna acolchada incluida en su precio, aunque pierde el rasgo de comodidad cuando se usa debajo de una armadura pesada. Puedes usar sólo esa armadura acolchada o abrigo interior para dormir, si tu armadura pesada esdestruido, o cuando no lleva la armadura pesada completa. Esto te permite mantener la armadura puesta y beneficiarte del poder de cualquier runa en la armadura pesada asociada, pero nadie más puede usar tu armadura pesada sin la capa interna acolchada.

equipment->Snare Kit.name: Snare Kit
equipment->Snare Kit.description: This kit contains tools and materials for creating snares. A snare kit allows you to Craft snares using the Crafting skill.

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Forager.name: Forrajeador
action->Forager.description:
Mientras usa Supervivencia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist} , si el cazador obtiene un fracaso o un fallo crítico, en su lugar obtiene un éxito.

Si el cazador obtiene un éxito, puede proporcionar alimento para 4 criaturas adicionales que comen tanto como un humano, u 8 criaturas con un éxito crítico.

action->Snare Crafting.name: Elaboración de trampas
action->Snare Crafting.description:
El cazador furtivo puede usar la habilidad de Elaboración para crear las siguientes trampas:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AFX1V0Go9DqPWBlN]{Alarm Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Km4lSOsyrip5q6iD]{Hampering Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oplQpQSTyTvHDDtq]{Marking Snare}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XcD8p1o71tPohZWT]{Signaling Snare}

El cazador furtivo puede crear cuatro trampas cada día sin pagar los materiales, utilizando 3 acciones de Interact para configurar cada trampa.

action->Hunt Prey.name: Cazar presas
action->Hunt Prey.description:
El cazador furtivo designa como presa a una única criatura que puede ver y oír, o una a la que está rastreando.

El cazador furtivo obtiene un bonificador +2 de circunstancia a las pruebas de Percepción de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} la presa y a las pruebas de Supervivencia de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} la presa.

La primera vez que el cazador furtivo golpea a la presa designada en una ronda, inflige 1d8 de daño de precisión adicional. El cazador furtivo también ignora la penalización por realizar disparos a distancia.ataques dentro de su segundo incremento de alcance.

Estos efectos duran hasta que el cazador furtivo usa Hunt Prey nuevamente.

4.label: Primer ataque a una presa cazada en esta ronda.

Priest of Pharasma.name: Sacerdote de Farasma
Priest of Pharasma.publicNotes:
Los sacerdotes de clausura salvaguardan sus templos y comunidades. Son los guardianes incondicionales de los principios de su dios, dedicados a difundir la palabra. Sus servicios de orientación o curación tienen el costo de una donación.

Las religiones inspiran a personas devotas a defender sus principios. Muchos de estos devotos buscan traer respiro y esperanza, pero otros tienen motivos más oscuros.

spell->Circle of Protection.name: Circle of Protection
spell->Circle of Protection.description:
You ward a creature and those nearby against a specified alignment. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful; this spell gains the opposing trait. Creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC against attacks by creatures of the chosen alignment and to saves against effects from such creatures. This bonus increases to +3 against effects from such creatures that directly control the target and attacks made by summoned creatures of the chosen alignment. Summoned creatures of the chosen alignment can't willingly enter the area without succeeding at a Will save; repeated attempts use the first save result.

Heightened (4th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

spell->Searing Light.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]
Luz abrasadora
spell->Searing Light.description:
You shoot a blazing ray of light tinged with holy energy. Make a ranged spell attack. The ray deals 5d6 fire damage. If the target is a fiend or undead, you deal an extra 5d6 spirit damage.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, searing light attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself and the spell's target

Critical Success The target takes double fire damage, as well as double spirit damage if a fiend or undead.

Success The target takes full damage

Heightened (+1) The fire damage increases by 2d6, and the spirit damage against fiends and undead increases by 2d6.

[[/r ((@item.level*2)-1)d6[spirit]]]{Leveled Spirit Damage}

spell->Consecrate.name: Consecrate
spell->Consecrate.cost: rare incense and offerings worth a total value of 20 gp × the spell rank
spell->Consecrate.description:
You consecrate a site to your deity, chanting praises and creating a sacred space. While within the area, worshippers of your deity gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks, and creatures anathema to your deity (such as undead for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Pharasma} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}) take a -1 status penalty to those checks. Attacks made by worshippers of your deity within the area deal 1 damage of one of your deity's alignment types (your choice); if your deity is true neutral, you don't gain this benefit.

Critical Success The consecration succeeds, and it either lasts for 10 years instead of 1 or covers an area with twice the radius. Occasionally, with your deity's favor, this might produce an even more amazing effect, such as a permanently consecrated area or the effect covering an entire cathedral.

Success The consecration succeeds.

Failure The consecration fails.

Critical Failure The consecration fails spectacularly and angers your deity, who sends a sign of displeasure. For at least 1 year, further attempts to consecrate the site fail.

Heightened (7th) The consecrated area also gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XZE4BawIlTf88Yl9]{Planar Seal} spell, but the effect doesn't attempt to counteract teleportation by worshippers of your deity. The cost increases to 200 gp × the spell rank.

spell->Gentle Repose.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]
Reposo suave
spell->Gentle Repose.description:
The targeted corpse doesn't decay, nor can it be transformed into an undead. If the corpse is subject to a spell that requires the corpse to have died within a certain amount of time (for example, raise dead), do not count the duration of gentle repose against that time. This spell also prevents ordinary bugs and pests (such as maggots) from consuming the body.

Heightened (5th) The spell's duration is unlimited, but the spell takes one more action to cast and requires a material component and a cost (embalming fluid worth 6 gp).

spell->Silence.name: Silence
spell->Silence.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).

spell->Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
spell->Spiritual Weapon.description:
A weapon made of pure magical force materializes and attacks foes you designate within range. This weapon has a ghostly appearance and manifests as a club, a dagger, or your deity's favored weapon.

When you cast the spell, the weapon appears next to a foe you choose within range and makes a Strike against it. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the weapon to a new target within range (if needed) and Strike with it. The spiritual weapon uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty.

The weapon's Strikes are melee spell attacks. Regardless of its appearance, the weapon deals 2d8 force damage. You can deal damage of the type normally dealt by the weapon instead of force damage (or any of the available damage types for a versatile weapon). No other statistics or traits of the weapon apply, and even a ranged weapon attacks adjacent creatures only. Despite making a spell attack, the spiritual weapon is a weapon for purposes of triggers, resistances, and so forth.

The weapon doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The weapon can't make any attack other than its Strike, and feats or spells that affect weapons do not apply to it.

Heightened (+2) The weapon's damage increases by 1d8.

spell->Death's Call.name: Death's Call
spell->Death's Call.description:
Trigger A living creature within 20 feet of you dies, or an undead creature within 20 feet of you is destroyed.

Seeing another pass from this world to the next invigorates you. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level plus your spellcasting ability modifier. If the triggering creature was undead, double the number of temporary Hit Points you gain. These last for the duration of the spell, and the spell ends if all the temporary Hit Points are depleted earlier.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Disrupt Undead.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]
Interrumpir a los no-muertos
spell->Disrupt Undead.description:
You lance the target with energy. You deal 2d6 vitality damage. The target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the creature critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Disrupting Weapons.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]
Armas disruptivas
spell->Disrupting Weapons.description:
You infuse weapons with vitality energy. Attacks with these weapons deal an extra 1d4 vitality damage to undead.

Heightened (3rd) The damage increases to 2d4 damage.

Heightened (5th) Target up to three weapons, and the damage increases to 3d4 damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.X7RD0JRxhJV9u2LC]{Spell Effect: Disrupting Weapons}
spell->Disrupting Weapons.target: hasta dos armas, cada una de las cuales debe ser empuñada por usted o un aliado dispuesto, o bien desatendida

spell->Heal.name: Heal
spell->Heal.description:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8

3 (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Mindlink.name: Mindlink
spell->Mindlink.description: You link your mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

spell->Shield.name: Shield
spell->Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

spell->Spirit Link.name: Spirit Link
spell->Spirit Link.description:
You form a spiritual link with another creature, taking in its pain. When you Cast this Spell and at the start of each of your turns, if the target is below maximum Hit Points, it regains 2 Hit Points (or the difference between its current and maximum Hit Points, if that's lower). You lose as many Hit Points as the target regained.

This is a spiritual transfer, so no effects apply that would increase the Hit Points the target regains or decrease the Hit Points you lose. This transfer also ignores any temporary Hit Points you or the target have. Since this effect doesn't involve vitality or void energy, spirit link works even if you or the target is undead. While the duration persists, you gain no benefit from regeneration or fast healing. You can Dismiss this spell, and if you're ever at 0 Hit Points, spirit link ends automatically.

Heightened (+1) The number of Hit Points transferred each time increases by 2.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

equipment->Religious Symbol of Pharasma.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.upzjwQ96cZG0Xlmx]
Símbolo religioso de Pharasma
equipment->Religious Symbol of Pharasma.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.upzjwQ96cZG0Xlmx]

Esta pieza de madera o plata está adornada con una imagen que representa una deidad. Algunos lanzadores de conjuros divinos, como los clérigos, pueden utilizar un símbolo religioso de su deidad como foco divino para utilizar ciertas habilidades y lanzar algunos hechizos. Se debe sostener un símbolo religioso en una mano para usarlo.

action->Healing Hands.name: Manos curativas
action->Healing Hands.description: Cuando el sacerdote lanza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, tira d10 en lugar de d8.

action->Steady Spellcasting.name: Lanzamiento de hechizos constante
action->Steady Spellcasting.description: Si la reacción de otra criatura pudiera interrumpir la acción de lanzamiento de hechizos del sacerdote, el sacerdote intenta un @Check[type:flat|dc:15] . Si el sacerdote tiene éxito, su acción no se ve interrumpida.

Prisoner.name: Preso
Prisoner.publicNotes:
La mayoría de los que terminan en una cárcel, calabozo o prisión simplemente están esperando el momento oportuno hasta que termine su encarcelamiento, tratando de encontrar formas de sobrevivir a días interminables de aburrimiento y privaciones. Algunos, sin embargo, pueden usar su tiempo en el interior para fortalecer sus conexiones criminales. Utilizando la fuerza y ​​la intimidación para ganar estatus entre otros prisioneros, crean armas improvisadas para derrotar a sus enemigos y darles una ventaja si es posible escapar. Incluso para los prisioneros que no se convierteninvolucrados en el mundo de la política penitenciaria, aprender a defenderse y proyectar un aire de dureza puede resultar esencial para sobrevivir en un lugar donde la gente tiene poco que perder.

Desafortunadamente, cada sociedad tiene personas que viven al margen. Si bien las buenas comunidades trabajan para brindar ayuda y respiro a los oprimidos, a veces -debido a una crisis económica, una hambruna o una guerra- las filas de los menos afortunados exceden la capacidad de la comunidad para apoyara ellos. En sociedades despiadadas, neutrales y malvadas, la pobreza se considera una inevitabilidad que nunca podrá ser erradicada del todo, o peor aún, como una herramienta que se puede manipular para obtener beneficios políticos.

weapon->Shiv.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]
Shiva
weapon->Shiv.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

El prisionero hace un daño de precisión extra de 1d6 a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

action->Surprise Attack.name: Ataque sorpresa
action->Surprise Attack.description: En la primera ronda de combate, las criaturas que aún no han actuado son @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} para el prisionero.

action->You're Next.name: Tú eres el próximo
action->You're Next.description:
Desencadenante El prisionero reduce una criatura a 0 puntos de vida.

Efecto El prisionero intenta una prueba de Intimidación con un bonificador +2 de circunstancia a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} una sola criatura que puede ver y que puede verlos.

Privateer Captain.name: Capitán corsario
Privateer Captain.publicNotes:
Una leve costra de sal cubre los faldones de esta marinera, y sus ojos acerados miran desde debajo del ala de su sombrero tricornio.

Llamado desdeñosamente pirata o ladrón por algunos, el capitán corsario comanda una tripulación leal que surca las aguas del Mar Interior y más allá. Los corsarios trabajan para su propio beneficio y reputación, por supuesto, pero también se comprometen a mantener las rutas marítimas libres de armadas que se esfuerzan por imponer el control terrestre.Ley sobre las olas ilimitadas. Los tiranos y los esclavistas son sus objetivos favoritos, y muchos colonizadores codiciosos o traficantes de carne han sido enviados al fondo del mar después de que el capitán liberó su cargamento. Generalmente, sin embargo, el capitán corsario está dispuesto a perdonar a los prisioneros para que puedan ser rescatados y difundir historias sobre las acciones de Firebrands por toda la región.

El capitán del corsario suele estar a la vanguardia de los grupos de abordaje. Muchos invocan el poder de los volublesdiosa Besmara para fortalecer a su tripulación en la batalla y santificar cada incursión a bordo. Tan a gusto en el agua como en cubierta, un capitán corsario estará encantado de saltar al mar para perseguir a un enemigo o rescatar a un compañero de tripulación caído. Aunque el capitán corsario puede presentar una bandera falsa o intentar engañar a un enemigo antes de la batalla, generalmente respeta los acuerdos de rendición y se esfuerza por cumplir su palabra, especialmente cuando trata con otros Firebrands.

Donde seaSi se puede encontrar opresión o una oportunidad para una aventura audaz, se puede encontrar a los Firebrands persiguiéndolos. Los PJ pueden considerar que los Firebrands son aliados en una búsqueda de una rebelión justa o de justicia contra la esclavitud, o pueden encontrar que estos apuestos temerarios son rivales amistosos (o no tan amistosos) por el mismo tesoro. El encantador sinvergüenza que se presenta aquí podría fácilmente ser un luchador por la libertad de bajo nivel o un complemento para los PJ, o podría servir como tripulación del capitán corsario. El capitán corsario puedeservir como un transporte dispuesto a llevar a los PJ a los lugares más peligrosos, un aliado intermitente que proporciona un rescate oportuno cuando menos se espera, un explorador competidor o un enemigo poderoso y mortal.

spell->Blade Barrier.name: Blade Barrier
spell->Blade Barrier.description:
Blades of force form a churning wall. The wall is a straight line 20 feet high, 120 feet long, and 2 inches thick, and it provides cover. The wall deals 7d8 force damage to each creature that's in the wall's space when it is created, that attempts to pass through the wall, or that ends its turn inside the wall. A basic Reflex save reduces the damage. A creature that succeeds at this save when the wall is created is pushed to the nearest space on the side of its choice. Creatures trying to move through the wall fail to do so if they critically fail the save, ending their movement adjacent to the wall.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

spell->Repulsion.name: Repulsion
spell->Repulsion.description:
You manifest an aura that prevents creatures from approaching you. When casting the spell, you can make the area any radius you choose, up to 40 feet. A creature must attempt a Will save if it's within the area when you cast the spell or as soon as it enters the area while the spell is in effect. Once a creature has attempted the save, it uses the same result for that casting of repulsion. Any restrictions on a creature's movement apply only if it voluntarily moves toward you. For example, if you move closer to a creature, it doesn't then need to move away.

Critical Success The creature's movement is not restricted.

Success The creature treats each square in the area as difficult terrain when moving closer to you.

Failure The creature can't move closer to you within the area.

spell->Breath of Life.name: Breath of Life
spell->Breath of Life.description:
Trigger A living creature within range would die.

Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} and restore Hit Points to the target equal to 4d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. You can't use breath of life if the triggering effect was disintegrate or a death effect.

spell->Control Water.name: Control Water
spell->Control Water.description: By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}.

spell->Downpour.name: Downpour
spell->Downpour.description:
You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames. Creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are Concealed to those inside the area. Creatures with weakness to water that end their turns in the area take damage equal to their weakness.

Heightened (+1) The fire resistance increases by 2.

spell->Freedom of Movement.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]
Libertad de movimiento
spell->Freedom of Movement.description: You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that has them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher level than the freedom of movement spell.

spell->Blindness.name: Blindness
spell->Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

spell->Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
spell->Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
spell->Dispel Magic.target: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item

spell->Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
spell->Faerie Fire.description: All creatures in the area when you cast the spell are limned in colorful, heatless fire of a color of your choice for the duration. Visible creatures can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by faerie fire. If the creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they are Concealed while affected by faerie fire, rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

spell->Resist Energy.name: Resist Energy
spell->Resist Energy.description:
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can target up to five creatures.

spell->See Invisibility.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]
Ver Invisibilidad
spell->See Invisibility.description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

spell->Silence.name: Silence
spell->Silence.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).

spell->Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
spell->Water Breathing.description:
The targets can breathe underwater.

Heightened (3rd) The duration increases to 8 hours.

Heightened (4th) The duration increases to until your next daily preparations.

spell->Water Walk.name: Water Walk
spell->Water Walk.description:
The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must Swim normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater.

Heightened (4th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Air Bubble.name: Air Bubble
spell->Air Bubble.description: A bubble of pure air appears around the target's head, allowing it to breathe normally. The effect ends as soon as the target returns to an environment where it can breathe normally.

spell->Bane.name: Bane
spell->Bane.description:
You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt.

Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area.

Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bane, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw.

Bane can counteract bless.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UTLp7omqsiC36bso]{Spell Effect: Bane}

spell->Chill Touch.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]
Toque frío
spell->Chill Touch.description:
Siphoning void energy into yourself, your hand radiates a pale darkness. Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead.

  • Living Creature The spell deals void damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round on a critical failure.
  • Undead Creature The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

Heightened (+1) The void damage to living creatures increases by 1d4.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Gust of Wind.name: Gust of Wind
spell->Gust of Wind.description:
A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you cast the spell to the line's opposite end. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Large or smaller creatures that later move into the gust must attempt the save on entering.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature can't move against the wind.

Failure The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If it was flying, it suffers the effects of critical failure instead.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 30 feet in the wind's direction, knocked Prone, and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

spell->Harm.name: Harm
spell->Harm.description:
You channel void energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 void damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse void energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
spell->Harm.target: 1 living creature or 1 willing undead creature

spell->Know Direction.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]
Conozca la dirección
spell->Know Direction.description:
In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location).

Heightened (7th) You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Shield.name: Shield
spell->Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

spell->Tidal Surge.name: Tidal Surge
spell->Tidal Surge.description:
You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Failure You move the target 5 feet in any direction along the ground or 10 feet in any direction through a body of water.

Critical Failure You move the target up to 10 feet in any direction along the ground or 20 feet in any direction through a body of water.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Rapier.name: Rapier
weapon->Rapier.description: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.

armor->Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
armor->Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

consumable->Healing Potion (Moderate).name: Healing Potion (Moderate)
consumable->Healing Potion (Moderate).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.G7haQ5gDt30ftJLC]

Una poción curativa es un frasco de un líquido rojo rubí que imparte una sensación de hormigueo a medida que las heridas del bebedor sanan rápidamente. Cuando bebes una poción curativa, recuperas [[/r (3d8+10)[healing]]]{3d8+10 Hit Points} .

consumable->Scroll of Remove Fear (Level.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]
Pergamino de Quitar el Miedo (Nivel 2)
consumable->Scroll of Remove Fear (Level.consumableSpellDescription:
With a touch, you ease a creature's fears. You can attempt to counteract a single fear effect that the target suffers from. This frees only the target, not any other creatures under the fear effect.

Heightened (6th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
consumable->Scroll of Remove Fear (Level.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EfFMLVbmkBWmzoLF]{Clear Mind}

Lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino requiere sostener el pergamino en una mano y activarlo con una actividad de Lanzar un hechizo usando el número normal de acciones para ese hechizo.

Para lanzar un hechizo desde un pergamino, el hechizo debe aparecer en tu lista de hechizos. Como eres tú quien lanza el hechizo, usa tu tirada de ataque de hechizo ydeletrea DC. El hechizo también obtiene el rasgo apropiado para tu tradición (arcana, divina, oculta o primordial).

Todos los componentes materiales físicos y los costos se proporcionan cuando se crea un pergamino, por lo que no es necesario proporcionarlos al lanzar un hechizo a partir de un pergamino. Debes reemplazar cualquier componente material requerido para ese hechizo con un componente somático. Si el hechizo requiere un enfoque, debes tener ese enfoque para lanzar el hechizo desde un pergamino.

Nota: Para crear un pergamino o varita de un hechizo específico, arrastre el hechizo desde el compendio o navegador de compendio al inventario de un PC, NPC o actor de botín.

action->Reach Spell.name: Alcanzar hechizo
action->Reach Spell.description: Si la siguiente acción que usa el capitán corsario es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} que tiene un alcance, aumenta el alcance de ese hechizo en 30 pies. Como es estándar para aumentar el alcance de los hechizos, si el hechizo normalmente tiene un alcance de toque, extienda su alcance a 30 pies.

action->Sink or Swim.name: Hundirse o nadar
action->Sink or Swim.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Efecto El capitán corsario ejerce su influencia sobre una masa de agua circundante. Durante 1 minuto, si un aliado dentro de 60 pies obtiene un éxito en una prueba de Atletismo para Nadar, obtiene un éxito crítico en su lugar, y si cualquier enemigo dentro de 60 pies obtiene un fracaso en una prueba de Atletismo para Nadar, obtiene un fracaso crítico en su lugar. .

Por la habilidadDurante la duración, los enemigos dentro de 60 pies del capitán corsario tratan el agua como turbulenta (si no estaba ya más agitada), requiriendo una prueba @Check[type:athletics|dc:20] para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, o la CD habitual del agua, lo que sea mayor.

Prophet.name: Profeta
Prophet.publicNotes:
Los dioses ocasionalmente envían mensajes en sueños a individuos que deambulan por las tierras, ganando seguidores con sus habilidades oratorias. Algunos profetas no han recibido verdaderas misivas divinas, sino que han malinterpretado sueños normales.

Las religiones inspiran a personas devotas a defender sus principios. Muchos de estos devotos buscan traer respiro y esperanza, pero otros tienen motivos más oscuros.

spell->Bless.name: Bless
spell->Bless.description:
Blessings from beyond help your companions strike true. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bless, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet.

Bless can counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RfCEHpMoEAZvB9IZ]{Aura: Bless}
spell->Bless.target: you and allies in the area

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Guidance.name: Guidance
spell->Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

spell->Heal.name: Heal
spell->Heal.description:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8

3 (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Know Direction.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]
Conozca la dirección
spell->Know Direction.description:
In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location).

Heightened (7th) You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
spell->Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]
Rayo de debilitamiento
spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
A ray that saps a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save to determine the spell's effect. If your attack roll is a critical success, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

spell->Read Fate.name: Read Fate
spell->Read Fate.description:
You attempt to learn more about the target's fate in the short term, usually within the next day for most prosaic creatures, or the next hour or less for someone likely to have multiple rapid experiences, such as someone actively adventuring.

You learn a single enigmatic word connected to the creature's fate in that time frame. Fate is notoriously inscrutable, and the word isn't necessarily meant to be taken at face value, so the meaning is often clear only in hindsight. The GM rolls a secret @Check[flat|dc:6|traits:secret]. If the creature's fate is too uncertain, or on a failed flat check, the spell yields the word "inconclusive." Either way, the creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

spell->Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
spell->Sanctuary.description:
You ward a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

weapon->Flail.name: Flail
weapon->Flail.description: This weapon consists of a wooden handle attached to a spiked ball or cylinder by a chain, rope, or strap of leather.

equipment->Manifesto.name:

Este manuscrito contiene escrituras de una religión en particular. Algunos lanzadores de conjuros divinos, como los clérigos, pueden utilizar un texto religioso como foco divino para utilizar ciertas habilidades y lanzar algunos hechizos. Se debe sostener un texto religioso en una mano para utilizarlo.

equipment->Robes.name:
