Incluso los bosques antiguos que no han sido tocados por manos o espadas mortales proporcionan a los bardosescenarios donde las leyendas sucedieron y podrían volver a suceder. Muchos encuentran inquietantes las profundidades del bosque, pero otros viven entre los árboles y junto a las criaturas que allí habitan.

weapon->Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
weapon->Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Staff.name: Staff
weapon->Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Forager.name: Forrajeador
action->Forager.description: Mientras usa Supervivencia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist} , si el rastreador obtiene un fracaso o un fallo crítico, en su lugar obtiene un éxito. Si el rastreador tiene éxito, puede proporcionar alimento para 16 criaturas adicionales que comen tanto como un humano, o 32 criaturas con un éxito crítico.

0.text: Al usar Supervivencia para subsistir, si obtienes un resultado peor que un éxito, obtendrás un éxito. También puedes proporcionar medios de vida de subsistencia para múltiples criaturas.

action->Master Tracker.name: Rastreador maestro
action->Master Tracker.description: El rastreador puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} mientras se mueve a toda velocidad.

action->Hunt Prey.name: Cazar presas
action->Hunt Prey.description:
El rastreador designa una única criatura que puede ver y oír, o una que está rastreando, como su presa. El rastreador obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +2 a las pruebas de Percepción de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} la presa y a las pruebas de Supervivencia de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} la presa.

La primera vez que el rastreador golpea a la presa designada en una ronda, inflige 1d8 de daño de precisión adicional. El rastreador también ignora la penalización por realizar ataques a distancia dentro de su segundoincremento de rango.

Estos efectos duran hasta que el rastreador usa Hunt Prey nuevamente.

4.label: Primer ataque a una presa cazada en esta ronda.

Troubadour.name: Trovador
Troubadour.publicNotes:
Los trovadores mantienen vivos los cantos tradicionales de su cultura y escriben obras originales para conmemorar grandes acontecimientos.

Las actuaciones pueden servir como entretenimiento, expresiones de belleza o parte de una cultura compartida.

spell->Calm Emotions.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]
Calmar las emociones
spell->Calm Emotions.description:
You forcibly calm creatures in the area, soothing them into a nonviolent state; each creature must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success Calming urges impose a -1 status penalty to the creature's attack rolls.

Failure Any emotion effects that would affect the creature are suppressed and the creature can't use hostile actions. If the target is subject to hostility from any other creature, it ceases to be affected by calm emotions.

Critical Failure As failure, but hostility doesn't end the effect.

spell->Magic Mouth.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eIQ86FOXK34HiNLs]
Boca Mágica
spell->Magic Mouth.description: You specify a trigger and a message up to 25 words long. When the specified trigger occurs within 30 feet of the target, an illusory mouth appears on the target and speaks the message, and the magic mouth spell ends.

spell->Charm.name: Charm
spell->Charm.description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Counter Performance.name: Counter Performance
spell->Counter Performance.description:
Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect.

Your performance protects you and your allies. Roll a Performance check for a type you know: an auditory performance if the trigger was auditory, or a visual one for a visual trigger. You and allies in the area can use the better result between your Performance check and the saving throw.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
spell->Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
spell->Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (3rd) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise}

spell->Inspire Courage.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]
Inspirar coraje
spell->Inspire Courage.description:
You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem}

spell->Lingering Composition.name: Lingering Composition
spell->Lingering Composition.description:
You add a flourish to your composition to extend its benefits. If your next action is to cast a cantrip composition with a duration of 1 round, attempt a Performance check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of a level equal to the highest-level target of your composition, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

Critical Success The composition lasts 4 rounds.

Success The composition lasts 3 rounds.

Failure The composition lasts 1 round, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.

spell->Message.name: Message
spell->Message.description:
You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you.

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

Heightened (3rd) The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

spell->Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
spell->Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

spell->Soothe.name: Soothe
spell->Soothe.description:
You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Spell Effect: Soothe}

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.

spell->Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
spell->Ventriloquism.description:
Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Rapier.name: Rapier
weapon->Rapier.description: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment->Lute.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MPv5Yx4w7scZGj2Y]
Laúd
equipment->Lute.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

treasure->Poetry Book.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.G5WuYX1ghrZcJ1J1]
Libro de poesía

action->Bardic Lore.name: Conocimiento bárdico
action->Bardic Lore.description: El trovador puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} sobre cualquier tema con un modificador de +7.

Urchin.name: Pilluelo
Urchin.publicNotes:
Aunque sus escapadas pueden ser notorias, pocos pilluelos buscan emociones fuertes. Para algunos pilluelos, cuando la mendicidad por sí sola no es suficiente para llenar sus estómagos, el robo se convierte en una táctica de supervivencia viable. Muchas potencias del inframundo también utilizan a los pilluelos como espías y mensajeros, mientras los entrenan para convertirse en futuros carteristas, ladrones y soldados de infantería.

Desafortunadamente, cada sociedad tiene personas que viven al margen. Mientras las buenas comunidades trabajan para otorgar ayuda yPara dar un respiro a los oprimidos, a veces (debido a la crisis económica, el hambre o la guerra) las filas de los menos afortunados exceden la capacidad de la comunidad para mantenerlos. En sociedades despiadadas, neutrales y malvadas, la pobreza se considera una inevitabilidad que nunca podrá ser erradicada del todo, o peor aún, como una herramienta que se puede manipular para obtener beneficios políticos.

weapon->Shiv.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]
Shiva
weapon->Shiv.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

action->Collaborative Thievery.name: Robo colaborativo
action->Collaborative Thievery.description: El pilluelo obtiene una bonificación de circunstancia +1 a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Palm an Object} mientras se encuentre a 10 pies de un aliado que tenga la habilidad de carterista.

action->Pickpocket.name: Carterista
action->Pickpocket.description: El pilluelo puede @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Palm an Object} que está estrechamente custodiado sin sufrir la penalización habitual de -5. Pueden @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} objetos que serían extremadamente notorios o que llevarían mucho tiempo eliminar (como zapatos desgastados, armaduras u objetos empuñados activamente).

Veteran Reclaimer.name: Recuperador veterano
Veteran Reclaimer.publicNotes:
Este semiorco canoso empuña un arco largo con la familiaridad de una mujer que lo considera más una extensión de su cuerpo que un arma.

Cuando cayó Lastwall, muchos de los antiguos Caballeros de Ozem se desanimaron y se dispersaron, vagando sin rumbo por las tierras salvajes del Mar Interior. Aunque los horribles acontecimientos que condujeron a la caída de Lastwall sacudieron su fe en la jerarquía tradicional de los Caballeros, endurecieron su determinación deCaza a todos los no-muertos de la faz de Golarion. Estos Crimson Reclaimers todavía ven al Tirano Susurrante como su principal enemigo, pero se les puede encontrar en muchas de las regiones más embrujadas del mundo, viviendo de la tierra y cazando a los muertos inquietos.

Aunque el heroísmo y el fervor por su causa todavía arden en sus corazones, los reclamantes veteranos han vivido lo suficiente como para perder el gusto por las historias de valor cortés y últimas resistencias valientes. Han aprendido el valor de la precaución yPor lo tanto, enfréntate a sus enemigos desde lejos y utiliza el terreno a su favor. Son rápidos en contraatacar a los enemigos que dañan a sus aliados, sabiendo que contar con compañeros de equipo incondicionales es esencial frente a los numerosos horrores del mundo.

Aunque la nación de Lastwall está destrozada y sus líderes han huido, el coraje de aquellos que una vez defendieron sus brillantes muros sigue siendo fuerte. Los Caballeros de Lastwall se encuentran en lugares de gran calamidad, escoltando a civiles y golpeandohacer retroceder a los no-muertos. Si los PJ alguna vez se aventuran en una zona de crisis, es probable que tampoco vean allí a los Caballeros del Último Muro, ya sea formando un muro blindado para defender a los inocentes o arrastrándose a través de páramos mortales donde incluso los más valientes conocen el miedo mortal. A menos que los PJ sean malvados o incautos involuntarios de los agentes de Tar-Baphon, la Vía de los Susurros, estos caballeros sirven principalmente como valiosos aliados en reinos donde las caras amistosas son raras. El virtuoso defensor podría ser miembro de un escuadrón de caballeroso un reclutador que busca personas dispuestas a arriesgar sus vidas para salvar a Avistan de un terrible peligro. El recuperador veterano probablemente se encuentre en las profundidades de Gravelands u otros reinos verdaderamente abandonados, donde incluso el más mínimo paso en falso puede provocar la muerte o algo peor. Estas almas astutas pero virtuosas podrían solicitar ayuda para llevar a las personas a un lugar seguro, actuar como guía a través de territorio desconocido u ofrecer valiosos consejos e información sobre criaturas peligrosas o trampas que los PJ podrían correr el riesgo de encontrar.
Veteran Reclaimer.speed: ignora los efectos del terreno difícil no mágico

weapon->Bastard Sword.name: Bastard Sword
weapon->Bastard Sword.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6KWYmeRMxsQfWhhJ]

Esta espada de hoja ancha, a veces llamada espada de mano y media, tiene un agarre más largo por lo que puede sostenerse con una mano o usarse con las dos manos para proporcionar poder perforador o cortante adicional.

weapon->Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
weapon->Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

armor->Breastplate.name: Breastplate
armor->Breastplate.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.r0ifJfoz8aqf0mwk]

Aunque se la conoce como coraza, este tipo de armadura consta de varias piezas de armadura de placas o media placa que protegen el torso, el pecho, el cuello y, a veces, las caderas y la parte inferior de las piernas. Otorga estratégicamente parte de la protección de la placa al tiempo que permite una mayor flexibilidad y velocidad.

consumable->Healing Potion (Lesser).name: Healing Potion (Lesser)
consumable->Healing Potion (Lesser).description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.e0vSAQfxhHauiAoD]

Una poción curativa es un frasco de un líquido rojo rubí que imparte una sensación de hormigueo a medida que las heridas del bebedor sanan rápidamente. Cuando bebes una poción curativa, recuperas [[/r (2d8+5)[healing]]]{2d8+5 Hit Points} .

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Crimson Vengeance.name: Venganza carmesí
action->Crimson Vengeance.description:
Frecuencia una vez por ronda

Requisitos El recuperador veterano empuña un arma a distancia con recarga 0.

Efecto El reclamador veterano realiza dos ataques con el arma requerida contra un objetivo que ha atacado al reclamador veterano o a uno de sus aliados en la última ronda (la penalización por ataque múltiple se aplica normalmente).

Si ambos golpean a la criatura, combine su daño para determinar las resistencias y debilidades.

action->Nature's Edge.name: El borde de la naturaleza
action->Nature's Edge.description: Los enemigos son @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} al recuperador veterano en áreas de terreno natural difícil o en áreas de terreno difícil resultante de una trampa.

action->Reflex Saves.name: Salvaciones reflejas
action->Reflex Saves.description: Los éxitos se tratan como éxitos críticos

action->Vengeful Edge.name: Filo vengativo
action->Vengeful Edge.description: Al atacar a una criatura que atacó al veterano reclamador o a uno de sus aliados en la última ronda, el veterano reclamador tiene una penalización de ataque múltiple de -3 o -2 con su daga.

action->Weapon Mastery.name: Dominio de armas
action->Weapon Mastery.description: Cuando el reclamador veterano golpea críticamente a una criatura que atacó al reclamador veterano o a uno de sus aliados en la última ronda, el reclamador aplica el efecto de especialización crítica del arma.

Virtuous Defender.name: Defensor virtuoso
Virtuous Defender.publicNotes:
Con su desgastada armadura de placas y su poderoso escudo, esta figura alta parece lista para enfrentarse a cualquier enemigo.

Incluso con la caída de la nación de Lastwall, muchas personas todavía dedican sus vidas a oponerse a las fuerzas y planes del Tirano Susurrante. Llamándose a sí mismos los Shining Sentinels, se ven a sí mismos como un baluarte contra una mayor expansión de la influencia del Tirano. Cuando no está reuniendo tropas para luchar contra sus juramentadosenemigos o protegiendo aldeas de incursiones de muertos vivientes, estos caballeros viajan por el Mar Interior con la esperanza de reclutar otras almas justas para luchar contra las hordas de muertos vivientes.

Muchos Centinelas Brillantes son sirvientes de buenas deidades, como Iomedae; En la batalla, utilizan los poderes que Dios les ha otorgado contra sus enemigos. Estos guerreros virtuosos anteponen la seguridad de sus compañeros a la suya propia y, a menudo, mantienen posiciones defensivas para proteger a sus aliados.

Aunque la nación de Lastwall está destrozada y sus líderes han huido, el coraje de aquellos que una vez defendieron sus brillantes muros sigue siendo fuerte. Los Caballeros de Lastwall se encuentran en lugares de gran calamidad, escoltando a civiles y rechazando a los no-muertos. Si los PJ alguna vez se aventuran en una zona de crisis, es probable que tampoco vean allí a los Caballeros del Último Muro, ya sea formando un muro blindado para defender a los inocentes o arrastrándose a través de páramos mortales donde incluso los más valientesconoce el miedo mortal. A menos que los PJ sean malvados o incautos involuntarios de los agentes de Tar-Baphon, la Vía de los Susurros, estos caballeros sirven principalmente como valiosos aliados en reinos donde las caras amistosas son raras. El defensor virtuoso podría ser miembro de un escuadrón de caballeros o un reclutador que busque a aquellos dispuestos a arriesgar sus vidas para salvar a Avistan de un terrible peligro. El veterano recuperador probablemente se encuentre en las profundidades de Gravelands u otros reinos verdaderamente abandonados, donde incluso el más mínimo paso en falso puede provocar la muerte.o peor. Estas almas astutas pero virtuosas podrían solicitar ayuda para llevar a las personas a un lugar seguro, actuar como guía a través de territorio desconocido u ofrecer valiosos consejos e información sobre criaturas peligrosas o trampas que los PJ podrían correr el riesgo de encontrar.

spell->Lay on Hands.name: Lay on Hands
spell->Lay on Hands.description:
Your hands become infused with vitality energy, healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch.

If you use lay on hands on a willing living target, you restore 6 Hit Points; if the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lyLMiauxIVUM3oF1]{Spell Effect: Lay on Hands}

Against an undead target, you deal 1d6 damage and it must attempt a basic Fortitude save; if it fails, it also takes a -2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 6, and the damage to an undead target increases by 1d6.
spell->Lay on Hands.target: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature

spell->Veil of Confidence.name: Veil of Confidence
spell->Veil of Confidence.description: You surround yourself in a veil of confidence. You reduce your current @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 1, and whenever you would become Frightened during the duration, reduce the amount by 1. If you critically fail a save against fear, veil of confidence ends immediately, and you increase any Frightened condition you gain from the critical failure by 1 instead of decreasing it.

weapon->Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
weapon->Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

action->Shield Ally.name: Escudo aliado
action->Shield Ally.description: El escudo del defensor virtuoso es más resistente en sus manos. Las estadísticas del escudo anteriores incluyen este beneficio; Es un escudo de acero normal para cualquier otra persona.

Warden.name: Guardián
Warden.publicNotes:
Los guardianes son los principales guardianes de fronteras y fronteras. Ya sea que vigilen una sola aldea o una región entera, los guardias están atentos a las amenazas externas a sus cargos. Los guardianes son personas incondicionales, a menudo llamadas por Erastil para proteger a quienes los rodean. Ya sea en tiempos de guerra o en la frontera, los guardianes suelen ser el filo de equilibrio entre una comunidad y la naturaleza salvaje en sus márgenes.

Los magistrados son los engranajesy engranajes que mantienen la burocracia en funcionamiento, moviendo la máquina bajo la inercia del status quo.

weapon->Bastard Sword.name: Bastard Sword
weapon->Bastard Sword.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6KWYmeRMxsQfWhhJ]

Esta espada de hoja ancha, a veces llamada espada de mano y media, tiene un agarre más largo por lo que puede sostenerse con una mano o usarse con las dos manos para proporcionar poder perforador o cortante adicional.

weapon->Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
weapon->Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

armor->Scale Mail.name: Scale Mail
armor->Scale Mail.description: Scale mail consists of many metal scales sewn onto a reinforced leather backing, often in the form of a long shirt that protects the torso, arms, and legs.

equipment->Backpack.name: Backpack
equipment->Backpack.description: A backpack holds up to 4 Bulk of items and the first 2 Bulk of these items don't count against your Bulk limits. If you're carrying or stowing the pack rather than wearing it on your back, its Bulk is light instead of negligible

equipment->Compass.name: Compass
equipment->Compass.description: A compass helps you Sense Direction or navigate, provided you're in a location with uniform magnetic fields. Without a compass, you take a -2 item penalty to these checks (similar to using a shoddy item).

equipment->Flint and Steel.name: Flint and Steel
equipment->Flint and Steel.description: Flint and steel are useful in creating a fire if you have the time to catch a spark, though using them is typically too time-consuming to be practical during an encounter. Even in ideal conditions, using flint and steel to light a flame requires using at least 3 actions, and often significantly longer.

equipment->Survey Map.name: Survey Map
equipment->Survey Map.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UhcRWtnjU2WLSClx]

Los mapas son poco comunes. La mayoría de los mapas que puedes encontrar son simples y funcionales. Un mapa topográfico detalla una única ubicación con excelente detalle.

Uno de estos mapas te otorga una bonificación de elemento +1 a las pruebas de Supervivencia y a cualquier prueba de habilidad para Recuperar conocimientos, siempre que las pruebas estén relacionadas con la ubicación detallada en el mapa.

El DJ determina qué mapas están disponibles en cualquierubicación.

1.label: Mapa topográfico (recuperar conocimientos sobre el área cartografiada)

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Warding Strike.name: Golpe de protección
action->Warding Strike.description:
Desencadenante Uno de los enemigos del guardián dentro de 100 pies ataca a uno de los aliados del guardián o a una persona que el guardián ha jurado proteger

Efecto El guardián golpea al enemigo que lo activa. Si el Golpe impacta, el ataque del enemigo se desvía, lo que reduce su daño en 8, o en 16 si el Golpe del guardián fue un golpe crítico.

action->Warden's Protection.name: Protección del guardián
action->Warden's Protection.description: Un guardián causa 1d8 de daño adicional a cualquier criatura que traspase el territorio que protege.

Watch Officer.name: Oficial de guardia
Watch Officer.publicNotes:
Los oficiales de vigilancia están asignados a un área determinada dentro de una ciudad o comunidad. A menudo lideran un pequeño equipo de guardias de menor rango y patrullan esas áreas para mantener el orden y hacer cumplir las leyes. Observe a los oficiales hacer su trabajo, aunque sus métodos no siempre son gentiles o amables. Debido a que el oficial de guardia es responsable ante sus superiores de su área, a veces necesita tomar decisiones difíciles entre justicia y eficacia.

Las sociedades más grandes dependensobre aquellos con la autoridad y la capacidad de interpretar y hacer cumplir las leyes. En sociedades bien alineadas, estos funcionarios desempeñan sus funciones de manera justa. En los países neutrales y malvados, estos funcionarios pueden ser duros y crueles (con una alineación alterada para reflejar esto), imponiendo severos castigos a aquellos que no pueden pagar por la misericordia.

weapon->Crossbow.name: Crossbow
weapon->Crossbow.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

weapon->Warhammer.name: Warhammer
weapon->Warhammer.description: This weapon has a wooden shaft ending in a large, heavy metal head. The head of the hammer might be single-sided or double-sided, but it's always capable of delivering powerful bludgeoning blows.

shield->Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
shield->Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

armor->Breastplate.name: Breastplate
armor->Breastplate.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.r0ifJfoz8aqf0mwk]

Aunque se la conoce como coraza, este tipo de armadura consta de varias piezas de armadura de placa o media placa que protegen el torso, el pecho, el cuello y, a veces, las caderas y la parte inferior de las piernas. Otorga estratégicamente parte de la protección de la placa al tiempo que permite una mayor flexibilidad y velocidad.

equipment->Signal Whistle.name: Signal Whistle
equipment->Signal Whistle.description: When sounded, a signal whistle can be heard clearly up to half a mile away across open terrain.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

action->Air of Authority.name: Aire de autoridad
action->Air of Authority.description: 10 pies. Las criaturas en el aura que tienen el mismo nivel o un nivel inferior que el oficial de guardia reciben una penalización de estado de -2 a su CD de Voluntad contra los intentos del oficial de guardia de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} ellas.

action->Bravery.name: Valentía
action->Bravery.description: Cuando el oficial de guardia obtiene un éxito en una salvación de Voluntad contra un efecto de miedo, en su lugar obtiene un éxito crítico. Además, cada vez que obtengan la condición @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado}, reduzcan su valor en 1.

action->Sudden Charge.name: Carga repentina
action->Sudden Charge.description:
Frecuencia una vez por ronda

Efecto El oficial de guardia Da dos zancadas. Si terminan su movimiento dentro del alcance cuerpo a cuerpo de al menos un enemigo, pueden realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra ese enemigo.

Zealot of Asmodeus.name: Fanático de Asmodeo
Zealot of Asmodeus.publicNotes:
Los fanáticos descubren complots contra su religión y buscan justicia para los seguidores de su iglesia. Este fanático sirve a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.QRkcFciCOmFoxF1B]{Asmodeus}, pero otros podrían servir a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.d56paSkcwvll2OhR]{Abadar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.AlL9GtlTldbqNoVm]{Calistria}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.eErEiVmBqltYXFJ6]{Iomedae}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.GX6PF9ifR47Xyjg9]{Norgorber}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Pharasma}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}, o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.ZfN7jkK6boU1FuiS]{Zon-Kuthon} . A menudo viajan en un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Jy2va0NTTbaUH1zP]{War Horse} usando bardas ligeras. Este caballo es un monstruo más en la lucha.

Las religiones inspiran a personas devotas a defender sus principios. Muchos de estos devotos buscan traer respiro y esperanza, pero otros tienen motivos más oscuros.

spell->Restoration.name: Restoration
spell->Restoration.description:
Restorative magic counters the effects of toxins or conditions that prevent a creature from functioning at its best. When you cast restoration, choose to either reduce a condition or lessen the effect of a toxin. A creature can benefit from only one restoration spell each day, and it can't benefit from restoration more than once to reduce the stage of the same exposure to a given toxin.

  • Lessen a Toxin Reduce the stage of one toxin the target suffers from by one stage. This can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the affliction.
  • Reduce a Condition Reduce the value of the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition by 2. You can instead reduce two of the listed conditions by 1 each.

Heightened (4th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} to the list of conditions you can reduce. When you lessen a toxin, reduce the stage by two. You also gain a third option that allows you to reduce the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} value by 1. You can't use this to reduce a permanent Doomed condition.

Heightened (6th) As the 4th-rank restoration, but you can reduce a permanent Doomed condition if you add a spellcasting action and a material component while Casting the Spell, during which you provide 100 gp worth of diamond dust as a cost.

spell->See Invisibility.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]
Ver Invisibilidad
spell->See Invisibility.description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

spell->Shield Other.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d7Lwx6KAs47MtF0q]
Escudo Otro
spell->Shield Other.description: You forge a temporary link between the target's life essence and your own. The target takes half damage from all effects that deal Hit Point damage, and you take the remainder of the damage. When you take damage through this link, you don't apply any resistances, weaknesses, or other abilities you have to that damage; you simply take that amount of damage. The spell ends if the target is ever more than 30 feet away from you. If either you or the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, any damage from this spell is resolved and then the spell ends.

spell->Detect Alignment.name: Detect Alignment
spell->Detect Alignment.description:
Your eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. You detect auras of that alignment. You receive no information beyond presence or absence. You can choose not to detect creatures or effects you're aware have that alignment.

Only creatures of 6th level or higher-unless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Sphere-have alignment auras.

Heightened (2nd) You learn each aura's location and strength.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Divine Lance.name: Divine Lance
spell->Divine Lance.description:
You unleash a beam of divine energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 spirit damage (double damage on a critical hit).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

spell->Forbidding Ward.name: Forbidding Ward
spell->Forbidding Ward.description:
You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ctMxYPGEpstvhW9C]{Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward}

Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.

spell->Harm.name: Harm
spell->Harm.description:
You channel void energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 void damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse void energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
spell->Harm.target: 1 living creature or 1 willing undead creature

spell->Magic Weapon.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]
Arma mágica
spell->Magic Weapon.description:
The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GnWkI3T3LYRlm3X8]{Spell Effect: Runic Weapon}
spell->Magic Weapon.target: 1 arma desatendida o empuñada por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Read Aura.name: Read Aura
spell->Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

spell->Sigil.name: Sigil
spell->Sigil.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your heightened level.

Heightened (3rd) The sigil instead fades after 1 month.

Heightened (5th) The sigil instead fades after 1 year.

Heightened (7th) The sigil never fades.

spell->Spirit Link.name: Spirit Link
spell->Spirit Link.description:
You form a spiritual link with another creature, taking in its pain. When you Cast this Spell and at the start of each of your turns, if the target is below maximum Hit Points, it regains 2 Hit Points (or the difference between its current and maximum Hit Points, if that's lower). You lose as many Hit Points as the target regained.

This is a spiritual transfer, so no effects apply that would increase the Hit Points the target regains or decrease the Hit Points you lose. This transfer also ignores any temporary Hit Points you or the target have. Since this effect doesn't involve vitality or void energy, spirit link works even if you or the target is undead. While the duration persists, you gain no benefit from regeneration or fast healing. You can Dismiss this spell, and if you're ever at 0 Hit Points, spirit link ends automatically.

Heightened (+1) The number of Hit Points transferred each time increases by 2.

weapon->Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
weapon->Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

weapon->Mace.name: Mace
weapon->Mace.description: With a stout haft and a heavy metal head, a mace is sturdy and allows its wielder to deliver powerful blows and dent armor.

shield->Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
shield->Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

armor->Half Plate.name: Half Plate
armor->Half Plate.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pRoikbRo5HFW6YUB]

La media placa consta de la mayoría de las placas de la parte superior del cuerpo utilizadas en la placa completa, con una protección de placa de acero más ligera o más escasa para los brazos y las piernas. Esto proporciona parte de la protección de la placa completa con mayor flexibilidad y velocidad. Un traje de esta armadura viene con una capa interna de armadura acolchada y un par de guanteletes.

consumable->Arrows.name: Arrows
consumable->Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

action->Swear Vengeance.name: Jurar venganza
action->Swear Vengeance.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura que el Zealot puede ver daña a un seguidor de Asmodeus que no sea el fanático.

Efecto El fanático obtiene el efecto de un hechizo de primer nivel @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}. Si el fanático realiza una tirada de ataque contra alguien que no sea la criatura desencadenante, el golpe verdadero termina sin efecto.

action->Channel Smite.name: Canal de castigo
action->Channel Smite.description: El fanático gasta un hechizo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} preparado y realiza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo. En lugar del efecto normal del hechizo, su daño de vacío se suma al daño del Golpe.

action->Deadly Simplicity.name: Simplicidad mortal
action->Deadly Simplicity.description: La maza del fanático causa 1d8 de daño en lugar de 1d6.
